It's a shame because graphics are great and if they stuck to more Monopoly it would be fun. Why would they pay Hasbro to use the Monopoly name and images and not use the game itself? I got bored and deleted after one day.

Played other games like it, but this game has a unique style thats very cute. I will say that progression is insanely slow, getting through through different cities will take you forever because they ramp up the cost of building upgrades very early on....

this game was advertised as a faster paced monopoly, this is anything but. You cant buy properties or trade with other players, you just mindlessly move around the board and upgrade buildings (which have no appearance in monopoly). This game has no sense of achievement and isnt linked to the classic board game.

Too many ads forced on you to spend real life money on dice rolls at the start of every game and once you have used all dice rolls in bar. Looks like a nice game but amount of in-game cash you need to upgrade buildings on each board increases gradually forcing you to use multipliers in order to accure enough in-game cash to move onto next board.

Holy hell the amount of pop ups and bundles is atrocious. You run out of dice and you get a minimum of 3 pop ups trying to get you to buy more. On the left side of your screen you end up with 4-5 different icons all to different bundles you can purchase. It's gross.

I mean it's alright. But what's the point like, just roll around a board? The pay wall is so obvious. Hit the 3rd board and then it takes days to progress. It's still alright once a day but the gameplay is so strange compared to other games I don't see where they enjoyment is. No actual skill mechanics in it at all.

This game is OK for a tryout game. 30 minutes to a dead stop. You don't get to pick where houses go. I see why there is an auto roll function. Money is collected, but there is no thinking required really. This is not the actual monopoly game. There are no learned skillsets here. Mindless entertainment, if that is what you like. Best wishes.

.... okay. It's Monopoly in the sense that the board looks familiar, the pieces look familiar, monopoly guy is there. Thats about it. The game is pretty much like any other 'board dice game' on the store. I collect monopoly sets, seeing this makes me wish I hadn't. So, why 2 stars? Scopely. They are know to be incredibly predatory with pricing and trying to nickel and dime as much as possible. Running out of 'rolls' shoved THREE pop ups in my face. Go push a rock up a hill Scopely.

It's a very nicely done monopoly "theme" game with nice animations and ui. However, mechanic is not really a monopoly game, rathter a clone of a few games put together in a nice package. Real monopoly you played this is not. Never the less, it's fun, at least for now. The real question is not wether I will hit a paywall, but when.

It's fun and just like the real game. So simple to play as well. One thing I'm disappointed in is that when I first got the game under the amount of dice rolls u have It said every hour it would add 5 dice rolls. But I don't think it dose any more. But over all it's brilliant total recommend

I love the game but... the only getting 6 dice an hour is just ridiculous it makes playing really boring sometimes because you can blow through your accumulated dice really quickly and most times you won't have enough to win any tournaments unless you pay for more which is really sad. Please reduce the amount of time it takes to accumulate dice, it would make the experience better for everyone!

Bought a pack, said there was an issue, no pack showed up. I was charged twice, now the game won't load gets to 33% and stops. Was frustrated before. Can't get enough to finish city. Only 5 rolls an hour, by the time you can roll again all progress destroyed.
column11: Hello! We are sorry to hear about your gaming experience. This was an issue affecting many players and our game team already managed to resolve. Please reach out to our Support Team for your purchase concerns as well.

column9: This game has lots of potential, but is hindered by how HUGE of a money grab it is. Five dice every HOUR is a bit ridiculous, but I get it, 0 ads = we need revenue. I'm not too salty about this part. The pop-ups are brutal. My friends and I are having a really good time working together for stickers, but we just found out that it's all for nothing unless we get all the rare ones ourselves (untradable). Please make this game fun for the players, and not just about money.

This is a blatant cash grab. There is no actual challenge, even rolling the dice can be automated making you use your rolls quicker so they can advertise more ways for you to pay them. It is more of an idle style game with very little user interaction. There is no real multiplayer, just randomly attacking a random user.

Unfortunately, only 2 stars for this game & here is why! PROS: Great graphics, music, sounds, special effects, gameplay & animations. CONS: There is NO strategy whatsoever, no buying land, no player trading, no nothing, this is a Monopoly ARCADE game with absolutely nothing to ever do. The game only gives you 5 dice roll a hour, to roll 5 dice, takes 10 seconds, you can play 10 seconds a hour for free, UNLESS YOU WANT TO BUY MORE DICE - Pop ups constantly to GET you to spend CASH - UNINSTALLED

This game is incredibly dull. 1 hour for 5 spins. Which means you need at least 6 hours before it fills, the amount it takes to level up is high, so the majority of time you own this game is spent waiting for spins. It's basically pay to play and since 30 spins which is gone is probably 1 min is almost $3 lol its an expensive pay to play game with no actual monopoly game aspect except the board you bounce around on.

Downloaded the game. Played to level 18 and then the game got stuck on a bank heist. Uninstalled then reinstalled the game and its still doing the same thing. The game is unplayable. Please fix my account. A week later and still no fix. Cant even get into the game and you guys wiped the info for my alternate account in the meantime... not very happy
column11: Hi there! Thanks for playing Monopoly Go! Our team is aware of the Bank Heist looping issue and is working on a fix. Please reach out to our customer support team in the meantime, so we can make some adjustments to allow you to play normally. Thanks!

column9: Love the overall experience. Better than the other games based on similar concepts . But one suggestion add in a mode where we can play the original authentic monopoly . Run a few ads and this game will break all records 💯

The game is fun and engaging. Minimal ads, they don't disrupt play time too often which is very nice. Awards and rolls of the dice are plentiful. Love the side games. Overall the game is two thumbs up.

Boring., especially since you only get 5 rolls an hour with no way to get more unless you buy in.,at least offer ads for more rolls. No fun side games. After you get past level 5, it will take over a week to get thru the levels because the cost of the buildings are so high. I only downloaded this to get some SB, I will be deleting it.

I'm giving two stars ONLY because the user experience was good. But this is NOT monopoly!!! There's no logic, no strategy, no control on what title deeds you own...or you own everything...? I played for 3-4 days and I still don't understand what this game has anything to do with monopoly other than the board is there on the screen. You just randomly keep rolling dice and nothing else.

This game is Coin Masters with a Monopoly theme (not that I don't like it ). I used to play coin masters a lot but it used to be easier earning spins(rolls) than it is in this game . It has room for improvement . Maybe in the future they'll fix that at least I hope so

Been registered to install. Have been playing for a few minutes and so long it has been fun. Graphics are nice, music is nice and it's awarding. Oddly it's the same principle/design of the game Board Kings.

I really like the game so far I just started playing it's a lot like coin Master. I am now on level three, and i will continue to play and in one week if I'm still liking the game as much as I do right now I will give it five stars I definitely recommend playing this game the graphics or excellent display line is Monopoly. Who don't like right try it you might like it I tried it and I love it...

It's a good game, but by god does it have a lot of pop-ups for in app purchases. Seems like every few rolls it's asking if I want to buy extras. It's also not just one pop-up at a time, it's usually three, one after another!
Regen is too slow. And the amount of pop-ups to purchase items is annoying. Everytime there's atleast 3 different pop-ups with the close button placed in a different place atleast 2 out of 3 times.

Downloaded this game thinking it was a normal monopoly board game but better with good scenery but I was wrong, and it's just a 1 tap button and it does everything for you. No sharing of money, trading, Bank , Mortgage or even anything that a Monopoly game should have and their is no multiplayer. Guess the ads tricked me 🤡Uninstalled ASAP 🤧🤧

Very bad customer service, you can't contact them about your issues with the game. They just give you a list of how to play. There's only an AI asking you questions but only sends you a link to their support website, which doesn't help. I tried to contact their email from the playstore, but they didn't respond. This game is a mess, and once you make progress, you are stuck in that one base because on the board report, there is one same person attacking your base and robbing you all at one.

This game is lots of fun. It does take a bit to figure out how to play but at least you don't have to spend a lot of money to play it. Lots of cool graphics. It has a bit too much going on, and can be confusing for very young players, or older players who have no idea what everything means, Lol!! All in all, a fun experience 🙂

I am able to download the Google Play Store on this Kindle so that I can play games that the Amazon Appstore doesn't have. 96% of the games I have downloaded to this Kindle from the GPS have worked with no problems. This is the only one that has given me any issues even after repeated install/uninstall. Now, I can't contact you through the game if it won't open and contacting you from the one working game on my phone defeats the purpose of this complaint. I will wait for the Amazon release.
column11: Hi! Sorry to hear the game doesn't load on your current device. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you. We also would like to encourage you to check our FAQs and look for the “Known Issues'' section where we update the status of the issues we are working on. Looking forward to hearing from you.

column9: You would expect the game that is all about capitalism to understand what and INCENTIVE is. By limiting the amount of dice rolls a player has and putting a timer on the roll refill, you are creating an incentive for the players to stop playing the game. The players still want to play games, so you're giving away your audience to the competition.

Love the game! Play with my husband. I would however give more rolls and more ways to earn dice We are on an extremely limited budget and can't afford to go willy nilly on them. But the game overall is great and we have fun with it.

This is the epitome of freemium. Every 2 minutes or so, it is asking you to buy more perks. Also, unlike regular monopoly, I am not sure what the goal of this game is. Update 4/20/23: After playing this game for about a week, I fail to see the objective or any really goal. There are people who are on level 1400! I uninstalled the game. Again, I don't see how you win.

Just a grinding game. Buy properties and clear the board. Rinse and repeat. Nothing fun about it. A lot of animation that takes up a lot time too. Not what I was expecting. Pretty disappointed to say the least.

I enjoyed the game until my save got completely corrupt for no reason and now I can't even load the game. Disappointed, really rather not have to restart. Edit: Thanks for the quick fix but can we do something about the frequency of the pop-ups?
column11: Hello! We are sorry to hear about your gaming experience. This was an issue affecting many players and our game team already managed to resolve.

column9: Great game but I feel like there isn't enough to keep players engaged. It's truthfully a game of luck and patience. I would love features or maybe mini games with things to do to keep players engaged. It can get boring after a while of playing. Other than that it's a pretty decent game. Try it out maybe you'll like it.

This game is so obviously a cash grab that it is sad. I do not usually write reviews but this game was so awful I felt I needed to. This game is clicking a button and watching a piece go in circles for no reward. Not to mention every time I run out of any resources I get 5 separate pop-ups trying to get me to spend real money to top up. This is another example of a bad company making a bad product and trying to suck more money out of its users.

Honestly its a truly GREAT game! Its so fun to play and addictive and there is ALWAYS something new to do (tons of mini games and objectives),i am truly quite impressed with the game.Runs so smooth and its not mb or battery eater as well.I really wish that they were more games like this one out there, performance and content provider speaking.Also the micro transactions are a lot to choose from and they have fair prices.If you love Monopoly,THIS is your game.Honestly Mindblowing result.Congrats!

Nice graphics... And that's it After 15 mins of play that is where you realise that you either have to wait a while day to get decent number of dice rolls to play again ... OR start spending money In parallel... There is no sense of engagement. You simply roll the dice and watch. Every now and again you build a building for a random value. No resemblance in terms of gameplay to the actual classic monopoly. Creators have used the name/images to create something completely different and boring

Good experience. But it could be better if they let us build everything in a board-city like a city building-game Also, it would help if player can choose where to build house/hotels. It feels more like a infinite dice rolling game not a MONOPOLY,luckily they added 105 cities to keep you busy for one month or so.

It has nothing to do with original monopoly, no strategy no brain puzzle. If anything its that coin master game with a pig on its cover from ~5 years ago repackaged into another theme. Like all freemium games starts with abundance of resources and rapid progress then quickly grinds to a halt and starts extorting money if you want to move ahead, not that there is anything to move towards, at its best its still extremely repetitive and boring

All you do is click the roll button and buy buildings. I probably saw more aggressive pop-ups than actual rewards. The game runs smoothly but it's boring, no chance to achieve anything unless you pay and even so still no rewards other than buying buildings and collect stickers.

Played for several hours here is my experience. Goods: graphics are good and game is really smooth, the first several hours are really enjoyable, building and changing map feels really good. Bads: Game literally wants you to spend money as soon as it has by popping up EVERY SINGLE purchase option EVERY TIME. Im on 4th map and grinding started already, it will probably take way too much time to move into the next locations in soon future. Will probably uninstall in several days or so.

I'm enjoying the game but everytime we're out of dice, i'm getting at least 3 top up that i should buy dices. I don't want it, alright? It get's annoying everytime getting these pop ups whenever i'm out of dices. Make it so we can turn pop ups off otherwise 1* review stays forever and will make me quit most likely even tho i'm playing very actively.

Ok so first off this isn't monopoly. Sure you got the board but you aren't playing against other players u are tapping a roll button to go around the board and collect money for landing on spaces (instead of pay for landing on a space). When you land on a railroad you invade another player's city to steal money which like...why it's not like ur vs them. Oh and game isn't actually a online game launch it and then turn on airplane mode game isn't played online at all.

Having a fun time playing. Wondering if your are able to play without Facebook account. I see you can play as a guest but although I do have a Facebook account, my mom doesn't but I would still like to be here friend in the game and play with her. I've sent her an invite and she has downloaded the game, but I don't see where I can add her as a friend yet.

Very clearly a rip off of Board Kings and other idle dice rollers but it does run and look really good. If you like these type of idle games where you roll some dice and collect a sticker book then you won't be disappointed. Also, be weary of anything scopely. They are a terribly greedy dev. Like other reviews said, pop ups and predatory spending models are their bread and butter. If you have an addictive personality to gaming, I would skip this one

Jesus Christ the amount of ads that you have to deal with is insane! I just want to play Monopoly! Why the hell do I need to X out of 50 offers every single time my screen changes!?! If I want to buy something I'll go find it after the first time it's offered to me. Stop cluttering up my screen!

Although the core gameplay is enjoyable, I have rated this game with a single star owing to its overtly predatory in-app purchase mechanism. The incessant bombardment of pop-ups for the latest transaction is disruptive and makes it challenging to accomplish anything in the game. While I appreciate the need for the game to generate revenue, the frequency of these notifications is unreasonable. I implore the developers to consider revising the frequency of these transactions to improve the game

Probably one of the smoothest, most entertaining and graphically pleasing Coin Master type game I've played. You get a good hour or so (depending on your luck) playing per day and the gameplay is usually quite rewarding. Just like all of these types of games, they lack a lengthy playtime due to their nature of having to wait for more dices or spins etc. Perhaps adding extra minigames that benefit your progress as a player would allow the game to earn more play time and satisfy addicted players.

This "Monopoly" is just in name only. It's nothing like the board game. You get 5 dice every hour, run out? Oh, lets just have a pop-up so you can buy more. Run out of in-game cash to upgrade? Here's another pop-up. You can even steal from others by robbing or knocking down a monument. This isn't it. It truly feels like nothing more than a cash grab base builder with a Monopoly skin. I could only put roughly 30 mins into this until I just couldn't any longer.

This game is hardly a game, it's basically just a cash grab because there is no actual gameplay. All you do is wait to get dice and roll, after getting more cash you upgrade your buildings. That's literally it. It's incredibly repetitive and it has little to no satisfaction. There are so many pop ups trying to sell you dice. Don't buy any, it's not worth it at all. Besides that, it is what it says it is. You get exactly what you expect. The only game like part is the card collection.

This is honestly such a fun game. And it's free to download.. wayyy better than the last monoply game they had on the app store. This game lets you get to build your own cities. Once you upgrade all the buildings per city, you move on to the next city. On top of that you can play with friends, bank heist & bulldoze their buildings down for more $. I 100% recommend you download this and start playing today. Psst.. also. I haven't seen an ad yet. And I've played for 2 days now.

Incredibly predatory with the insane amount of microtransactions. I was enjoying playing the game but to be asked every moment I ran out of money or dice to pay for more, and or everytime I logged in to be asked to buy something with actual money is horrendous. It's a pay to win game and it's not worth your time at all.

Game itself is fun, but there are super aggressive popups. As soon you ran out of energy, three popups offering you to buy this or that appears. It's too much. I know you have to make money through micro transactions, but this encourage me to install the game instead of throwing money on it.

This game has the potential to be totally fantastic & addictive. However....there is a big BUT.....which is that it is WAY TOO slow waiting for more dice rolls unless you are prepared to pay to play. Can you please have an option to watch ads to get more dice rolls? Without any limitations to how many times you can watch ads to gain more dice rolls. But please be realistic & make it a reasonable number of dices rolls you get for each ad watched (eg: at least 10 dice rolls for 1 ad watched).

Fun and addicting game! Really pretty and satisfying, I just want to keep playing. I don't feel like paying for dice rolls but would be nice to have the option to watch some videos to get some extra rolls like in other games.

Real monopoly teaches very basic economy in an over-simplified manner. This version of it tells the player that rich topple others in order to get money. Aside from the game being mindless clicking with too many ads like, many others pointed out. It's sad to see such an entertaining franchise, even though it was being burnt down to hell by each new release in the last two decades, this game is another nail to it's own coffin. What a comrade developer.

The balance between free and paid features is way off. The game depends on being able to roll the dice to get cash rewards to upgrade your properties but with just 5 free rolls per hour, gameplay stalls pretty quickly and it's evident that to play in any meaningful way it's going to cost ££££ daily. Shame, because it looks great and is fun and entertaining but not something I will play going forwards.

It's a good game but there's not much to do except press on a button but I do love to mess up my friends. The cooldown to get more rolls is obssured... Way too long. I usually just come on for 5 minutes and than go away... Cmon, at least add some sort of monigame to engage people.

Take a popular franchise, make a game out of it and mislead everyone by adding "go" in the title. Sounds like a good idea on paper but it's literally a copycat of something that has been already done so many times. It belongs to the past. We never asked for another "social" game that consist of mashing buttons and stealing soft currencies from strangers. I wonder who thought it would be a good idea to copy such boring mechanics and disguise them behind the Monopoly branding but here we are.

It's fun, but: 1-You run out of dice quickly and then get hit with, on average, 3 purchase pop-ups which aren't needed. 2-The needing to connect to Facebook for your account instead of your Google account is irrelevant for people, like me, who don't use Facebook. Other than that, the game is fun.

There's nothing Monopoly or "GO!" about this game besides the licensed board and character. You can't do anything besides click wherever they tell you to. The reward is building unrecognizable landmarks in cities that also don't have anything but the name in common. Once in a while you can go destroy other people's landmarks, which somehow makes money for you. The railroads just initiate a "bank heist", which is an infantile match-3 activity where you steal money from other players. BOO!

Enjoyable to a degree. This game could be a real hit, if only it didn't take so damn long to regenerate rolls. I mean fairs fair they want to make money, but honestly, the amount they charge for rolls is ridiculous. Truthfully, this game could be great.. it is very enjoyable, but please give us a break and give out more free rolls.

I didn't have super high hopes for this game, but I was proven oh so wrong. It's very similar to Coin Master but more interesting with the chance cards and jail, and I haven't received a single intrusive ad, I haven't received any ads at all! I've found myself quickly hooked on the game. 10/10

The cards and roll dices could improve alot. The gold cards should either be tradable, or if you get a gold card, you shouldnt get duplicates, or if you do get a duplicate, you should be able to trade it with a monopoly store, for a normal card you need that is rare It would also be great if you get more dice rolls after an hour. Also the ads everytime you log in to buy things could also be removed. Other than that, it's a good game

It's a pay to play game. You quickly grind to a halt unless you spend 6.99$ every time to extend your play time. And the further you go the longer it takes and the more money you need to spend to play enjoyable. Otherwise it's a hour long wait to get 5 dice rolls, making it unplayable.

Somewhat fun but repetitive and basically a rip off of coin master, also encountered a bug that causes the game to believe I've run out of rolls after landing on a train station, causing me to be stuck on someone else's board but also having a "out of rolls" dialogue popping up

Too many pop-ups... You start the game? 3 pop-ups! You don't have any dice left? 2 pop-ups. Friends pop up etc. The gameplay is always the same and just scales up. I think it has quite some bots in it to simulate more people because I'm getting constantly raided by level 0 players which raid me more than once in a few minutes and destroy my shields with it. It feels like the more friends you have the more you get raided. Shouldn't they be more helpful and your raids more against strangers?

Game looks great and plays very smooth. It's completely different to the classic monopoly board game. It's very repetitive. I can't see myself playing this game for months and months, however it's only day 1, I'll give this a bit more time before making a final decision.

Love this game, BUT not enough dice for go. Takes way too long to regenerate dice after all have been used. Game can't count number of spaces on the board, misses 1 or 2 spots on rolls. This game is good but it COULD be made GREAT!! Still a fun game to play though and the FB monopoly go page is friendly and very welcoming.

I was expecting different before the game came out, but it is completely P2W and it is progressing very slowly, windows are constantly appearing on the screen recommending you to make a purchase It is impossible to enter the top 10 without paying money in events

This is a great game and time killer it's kinda of like the classic monopoly game just with a little extra the game runs good and the graphics are good the only bad thing is, is that it's really expensive to build your land marks and upgrade them.

The graphics and little animations are really good! Felt a sense of nostalgia seeing the car move around the board. Really love the going up against friends as well, can't wait to destroy their buildings wahaha

The only thing I like of this game is the graphics other than that nothing. The amount of pop ups asking to buy something is horrendous I was enjoying this game I really do but it doesn't really feel like you're not accomplishe anything not feel great when upgrade or anything I feel so disappointed hope they fix this game if not is going down hill.

The game is fun, when I actually get to play it. Between plays, you get 400 notifications (That the game doesnt let you turn off) forcing you to open the game, and when you do, you're greeted with 4-5 pop ups begging you to spend money. What happened to gaming...

I pre registeres for this game and downloaded it today, so far I'm loving it , reminds abit of coin master as you have to bulldoze other players landmarks , there are in app purchases like most games but at the moment you don't need buy really as this is a generous game coin wise , easy to earn coins ,badges etc. There's nothing I don't like about it, graphics are cool and I recommend giving this game ago.

Absolutely love this game But confused as to why we can't trade are gold cards. I pay money for this game and get extra gold cards. I should be able to help other if I choose to do so. That makes it a big downside to the game for me.

I was enjoying this game but now, after I spent 2 days playing, I have not been granted my rewards. I sent into thr offerwall and they said the advertiser didnt respond so I dint get my rewards. Thats messed up because I followed the rules and I have never played this game before. Very disappointed. Thats just not right. Wasted two days.

If I had to describe this game in one word that word would be "predatory". Its the same thing over and over with the goal being completing board's. You are encouraged to buy more rolls at every moment in order to continue completing boards for no there reason than to complete more boards. Seems to be an application designed to try and extract as much money from their "customers" as they can, in any way possible. Monopoly is traditionally a kids game making this eve worse.

I purchased the endless special pack and it didn't give me anything and crashed my game. I bought it again and it worked vut after contacting them they haven't replied. I will update my review when/if they correct the problem. Edit.. They eventually sorted it out.
column11: Hi! We are sorry our customer care team was unable to help you. Please give us another try. Looking forward to hearing from you soon. Thanks!

column9: Would've given this a 5 star rating if it weren't for the fact that the ads keep coming up automatically, even when you're playing the same board, for the packages for money, dice, etc. Other than that, I really like this game!

It's like coin masters just with a monopoly board as a way to get more rolls. Get attacks and looting opportunities by landing on railroads. Get additional cash to upgrade your towns plus special coins for more rewards by landing on specific properties.

Very competitive but it's amazing fun especially when you have a lot of friends who has downloaded it as well it's amazing. But if you are someone who gets upset easily probably don't okay with friends because they destroy your property.

Initially I gave a 5 star as the graphics and the game idea were engaging and fun, I soon after realized the time for new rolls to load is exaggerated, if you wait for all 50 you'll have to wait 10 hours. It needs to be at least half of that. The game is also very repetitive, uninstalled

You don't play monopoly at all. It's a lie. They just put new skins onto mobile solitaire games but without anything resembling an actual game of some kind. So in summary if you want to play monopoly you will NOT be doing anything like that here. If you think the monopoly guy looks cool and wish you could see repeated images of him in various poses and settings while being genuinely aroused by the Free Parking space. well you're in luck, this is the gam... thing... App for you.

the game is fun and I really enjoy it hope y'all keep it up. 😆 Update: once I figured out how to make friends the community chest was no longer a problem I really like this game thank you for making this game. I have a suggestion make a way for us to get more dice having to wait several hours to do anything kills the fun it would be nice if we could watch adds for more dice l.

Games alright.. The pop ups every 2 seconds is bloody annoying ! I'd rather not click into playing the game so I'm not bombarded with pop ups trying to get you to spend money or invite friends to the game, 3 in a row ! Too much.

This is only day 2 playing. So far so good... Bonus part is ads not popping up every minute while in the middle of Playing. That is one of the most irritating things possible, in the middle of playing the game & have ads start popping up & interrupt your game

Im having to put my rating down, started of great.....was enjoying the game. Now I've got in to it its not all that good. You certainly need to sort out the trading of stickers. Its to easy to be attacked or to have all your money stolen. Needs some work, not enjoying so much now.
I'm loving this game! The graphics and incentives are plenty to keep playing without having to purchase anything, but if you're able, that's an option too! Two thumbs up, Hasboro!

Games is similar to coin master but one thing annoying about this is of you are rolling x10 or x5 or any other it doesnt gove you that amount if you land on a card and it states to give you more dice, the "x10" shows at the bottom but it just doesn't and is unfair and obviously needs fixing

The game is good. I like how you get rewards when you complete certain tasks. However, in the game you cannot trade gold cards and there seems to be no special events where you can trade them so, can you add some gold cards trade event for once a week and also can you add sticker packets in the store as well because it will help people complete sets. If you do this can you make it where you pay for the packets with the money you earn in game and raise the price the further they get in game.

Loved this as a game until I reached Venice. The third map. Too expensive and you run out of die very fast. I had over 100 and on that board only unlocked 2 buildings fully until I was out. It's fun just not enough stuff unless you buy dice.

If you got into playing the board game monopoly you will love this fast paced challenging game it's some good competition and you can half a half-half friend ship and still turn on them when the choice is right to destroy their property..! Because at the end of the day it's only about one person the WINNER NUMEROUNO THE HIGHEST EARNER & THE ROUGHEST DEMOLITION TEAM

Horrible..unless you are playing for Swagbucks or something similar then avoid this game. There is zero RNG it is all predetermined where you will land. An event to gain tokens by landing on utilities..40 max rolls land on it 3 times..events over 40 max rolls land on it 15. This game is not a game it is a cover to try and get you to buy more rolls at every moment..do not download it is trash.

Remember that games are suppose to be fun, not for us to be baited to buy more dice throws. The kids got so happy in the beginning, but when their dice throws ended they are so sad and crying begging to buy and buy... This is no good. Not healthy as it can be very addictive especially for young kids and perhaps some adults. A game should be fun. Throw in some ads if revenue is needed to sustain the game function, but not 3 ads in our face asking for money.

It's a good game but giving it one star because it takes a long time to get dice - 1 hour to get 5 and every time you run out of dice, annoying pop ups come up asking you to get more dice by spending money. At least 2 each time. It is very very annoying. It nearly makes me want to stop playing sometimes..

Rolls are not random! 70% of the time I'm landing on chance, community chest, free parking, just visiting, and the utilities. It rare to land on anything else. I've repeatedly gone around board hitting only chance and community chest this is impossible on it's own but repeatedly and consistently? Always bugging you for money and linking to Facebook. Then there's hitting go to jail luxury tax and income tax all in a row. This game is awful! Just hit go to jail three times in a row. Uninstalled!

I feel like it would be worth it if itll let you get passed agreeing to the terms and services. The app force closes everytime "I Agree" pops up. I've unstalled and re-installed a few times with no luck each time, itll still force close.
column11: Hi! Sorry to hear the game keeps on crashing. Please contact our Support Team so that we can take a look at your account and help you. We also would like to encourage you to check our FAQs and look for the “Known Issues'' section where we update the status of the issues we are working on. Looking forward to hearing from you.

column9: The only thing I hate is having to wait an hour just for 5 rolls. Other games that dispense energy or whatever every so often, they at least give one every minute and a half or even every two minutes. But other than that I love the game.

Was hoping for actual monopoly. This is just rolling the dice non-stop, collecting money, and upgrading properties to advance to the next level. The appearance is monopoly, the game play is something else.

I REALLY enjoy this game. What I really REALLY don't enjoy, is the 4 annoying pop ups encouraging me to buy more dice rolls and to invite friends! They repetitively invade my screen each time i log in to play and when i run out of rolls. We know where to buy rolls - there's about 400 flashy offer icons on our screen we can make purchases on ... if we wish. And if we wanted to invite friends (or had friends who played to invite) we would! STOP ASKING! Only reason for 1 star. Otherwise, super fun!

I'll add my comment after a month playing. The problem I have with this game is you don't have a search box when shutting down a friend and I always get attacked by 15 different person who are not my friend with only 5 protection. Everytime I woke up my landmark are already destroyed. Please add some protection or extend the defense. And it feels like the chest is very useless for me. 😭 Overall, the game is good even there is a bug sometimes.
column11: Hi Ryuzaki! We are happy to hear you are enjoying the game. Your feedback is important to us and we want to thank you for playing Monopoly Go!

column9: I used to love this game as it was very easy and perfect to kill time. But after the latest update, ranking up becomes so hard. Everytime someone shuts down a property, your level gets rank down. Meaning, everytime I open the app, I'm always greeted with zero cash and a ranked down levels.

Very agressive ads, gameplay lacks of interaction. The only action you'll have to do, is pressing roll the dice. To be fair the original game doesn't have many other interactions, but still, you have at least some choices to do, manage your budget efficiently to not go bankrupt. The social part is the reason I decided to give it a go, because my wife loves monopoly. Well social aspect is really poor. You'll visit more stranger places than your friends one.

Overall Great game. However, when the sticker album changes to new sets, you should keep all your earned stars! I spent so much time earning stickers. Earned all but 10 out of the 325, had 470 stars ready to use, and woke up to 0 stars and no rewards for my completed sticker sets. And just a little too long waiting on only 6 dice though! Should be like 20 so you get a few good rolls in before running out again.

Game seems okay but pretty much money you get from the board is useless by the 5th level only thing that matter is bank robbery. Also the amount of pop-ups to buy stuff is beyond annoying everytime you enter the game. Seems as all games pay 2 win.

Basically board king got reskinned as monopoly. I quite like it though! It's a game to pass the time or if you have ADHD like myself you could do it while you multitask other things. Overall it's pretty fun 😊

The game is pretty dope! Its fun and very well made. But it would be nice if we could have a couple gamemodes where we can play the standard monopoly and play with friends. This review may update every so often.

It reminds me of another game, forget who though. I don't think I will have it for long. I may be wrong. On the other hand, monopoly slots another timeless game our imagination wanders aimlessly with is one of the better slot games.

Hey! I Have been playing your game, and I love how it's laid out, I have a suggestion, with your company's social media, you should do codes that give spins and card packs etc. This might help you build your games popularity for people who are following your page on Facebook, twitter or even tiktok! This is also beneficial for users who will give your page attention for a little reward

This game is honestly frustrating. First of all the shields don't do anything your still being robbed of cash through "bank heists" I had 1 million and someone steals literally all of it I kid you not, to the point I was down to only 3000. Don't waste your time with this game you'll only be frustrated to log back in and see all your money gone. It's disappointing because you need a lot of it to upgrade these buildings.

This didn't even count as a game. You don't play Monopoly. You are the only piece on the board and you already own everything. There is no playing. Just an auto roll and click button for the the predetermined "upgrades"
A great addicting game to pass the time. My only problem is that rolls seem too long to rejuvenate, so it gets boring once you get to higher levels

Honestly, just stay away from this game. One star for Quality and Nostalgia This app is just so predatory for your money. Insane amount of pop ups for you to spend money. Nothing like monopoly, so monotonous, just Tap the roll dice and that's it. You have no way to ACTUALLY protect your money/buildings, you can and will lose it all while your away. I don't see anything actually fun and rewarding from playing this. Even if you have money, why throw it at this ? You don't even get anything ...

I have been playing this game for a little while now and I have to say I do like to aesthetic of the game. I like the idea of the game. That way you can be involved with other people and their boards. However, I don't like how long it takes to get rolls and I don't like how there's so many pop-ups but the most frustrating one. It really is the roles you get 5 rolls for 1 hour. That doesn't give you much to do.

This game is horrible and thebdeva are veey greedy. After getting to board 5 I'm stuck without spending tons of money. At 5 dice per hour by the time they recharge my buildings are destroyed and my money is stolen. No way possible to progress without buying dice or money packs. Definitely not a free to play game.
Entertaining game, although you can't change your "Token". At least not yet. And the progress feels... empty. Not rewarding at all, there are also a lot of "Pay" pop-ups.

If we ignore the fact that we must pay to actually play after a while and for those of us who don't, we don't even have a small chance to actually earn most daily rewards, today I ve earned around 200 dice throws and for my surprise while I had around 70 left, I just got to 1.. So for that reason, unninstalling this game.. Waste of time

Game stucked at one level. I am explaining the exact scenario. I am out of rolls and on last roll my piece comes to attack on other opponent, exactly here my game stucks and screen freezes. You need to handle this scenario. Hi, I have mailed them around 4 days ago with ss and proper explanation of the scenario. There is no reply from your team.
column11: Hello there! We are sorry to hear that you're having some freezing issues. Most performance-related issues can be resolved with some basic troubleshooting. If these steps didn't help, please contact our support team at monopoly-go-support@scopely.com so that we can better assist you.

column9: 0 stars but 1 because google gives NO CHOICE lol. non stop Annoying pop ups, it's not even a game lol This was a very quickly thought up (ripped off), and thrown together cash grab attempt, piggy backed off of a popular Name and the nostalgia from it. It reminds me of one of those pointless, manipulative, flashy lights, you're a winner, can you spend types. you know the ones you find in the offerwall when trying to earn some free in game currency for a game that's actually a GAME. lmao.

Always loved playing monopoly Just don't like that you gotta add five friends just to unlock a mini game in community chest, if I add all five friends what happens to the money, do we have to play a mini game to get it? Just wish you had more things to do if you land on a community chest. Also don't like that it takes like a one hour just to earn five rolls.

It's pretty much an archaic skinner box game using your Facebook to add friends to the game. It's kind of funny but when you run out of rolls you'll be blasted with ads for more dice rolls. Don't play this, it's a waste of time and money.
Gets tedious after a while and the amount of pop ups pushing you to buy more rolls is annoyingly pushy. At least 3 when you enter the game and 3 more when you run out of rolls or try to exit.

The new update may added freebies but it took away alot of other things like the amount of shields on the board. Now it's harder to land on shields. The money is ridiculously low to have to pay millions for buildings so u have to roll x10 or 20 to get a higher pay but now your outta dice
We need more dice per hr to level up. Hard to play. It would be amazing to be able to play with our friends! On our boards and play against them buying properties and paying rent etc.

Okay fun but omg i gotta quit this game because of the ads alone. Every time I run out of dice I get two pop ups with different locations for the close button. It's so annoying, and honestly just more obvious that it's a cash grab.

Enjoy being nagged? Then you'll love this game! It's non-stop pestering all the way as you constantly say no to any number of interruptions as you're tempted to part company with all the money you own... ...which is a shame as there's a good game hidden somewhere behind all the flim-flam. You just need the patience of a saint to find and enjoy it.

This is a great game eventhough it's just simple. Graphics is nice, gameplay is easy. My only problems are adding friends, it is to complicated. Just make a list and add a search option and an add button, that's it. Also, there are no trading feature for duplicate stickers. Pls., add some. Thanks. Hoping for some improvements.

The exact same thing as Board Kings. And I really mean it, it's the exact same game. You have to pay to get more dice rolls, there are stickers to collect and you can change boards after you upgrade all your buildings.

This is just Coin Master with a Monopoly face limited "spins", multiple building levels till you get to the next stage, and invading to get more money to "build" this game does nothing unique if you played games such as Coin Master you have played them all

Haven't been playing it very long. Just downloaded the game;uh 3-4 hours ago. But so far I am enjoying it. I have loved playing Monopoly since a real young age. Monopoly Go! slightly different than original version. What like the best about this version. I can play it all by myself. Not having to get another person to play with you.In order to play the original Monopoly game. At least one other player or more than one other person we needed.To play.And this Go version you need a device & you.

The game has no strategy behind it and the moment you run out of dice it will bombard you with ads to spend your hard earned money to get more dice. This game preys on your nostalgic memories of Monopoly and tries to capitalize on it with little effort.

Sorry but this is nothing like "monopoly". It looks like some 3 years old- press the button- rip off with monopoly logo in it. There is no strategy, no thinking, no explanation, and nothing to do except pressing that laggy roll button. Really sad for what this turns into. Why would anyone spend money creating and advertising this is beyond me.

It is an okay good for when you are bored, but the problem I have with the game is they are trying to force you into paying to progress, when you open the game at least 5 pop ups come up trying to get you to purchase something. In my opinion this is a dangerous practice.
It's fun, but I've been noticing that the game is glitching. When I go to another board to smash, the game unloads incomplete, and I have to close the app and restart.

So far it's pretty good 👍😊 It is so reminiscent of I think it's called like piggy heist or something like that though I was hoping it would be a little bit more like get rich a monopoly type game play 😕 and as far as I know there was no replacement game or anything.. not sure why Monopoly haven't implemented a similar game yet the platform and the game was very similar and he was a total money sucks so there's no reason for them not to do that.. I spent so much money 💰 lol

This is quite possibly the best board tile game anywhere! It's incredibly fun,addictive,and very easy to play! Lots of rewards as you progress! The only other tile game that comes close is Board Kings.

If i could rate 0 stars, i would. Well, this was a big disappointment and a waste of a wait. When it read monopolyGO! I was expecting something like pokemonGO, but no, quite the opposite. Silently ripping off coin master and most likely many other games, and to have to wait a whole hour just for 5 rolls is absurdly laughable. In 2 seconds, the rolls are gone, and you're left waiting again to play the game.

Love everything Bout it, works smoothly, nonstop action, there's almost always something to do and even if you manage to run out of rolls, they respawn quickly or the game straight gives you rolls or ways to get rolls.

I love this game. So much fun. It would be even better if you the creators of the game were to give players more coin gifts and lives, plus reduce the waiting time for lives as by the time lives are added our buildings are being damaged. I would love this game more if it didn't so long to load at times.

I did give this a five star just because it was a fun past time game now I'm dropping it to one star because and I can't understand how or why people are still able to destroy my landmarks when i have shields I put a lot of time in this game and it's demoralizing to wake up and find my landmarks damaged or destroyed when I clearly have one or two shields active if this don't get fixed I'm uninstalling

Monopoly with a twist, of building structures with your earnings, doing bank bank heists on your Facebook friends, attacking their buildings etc whilst still adding houses to the board, you can use auto roll and it's self explanatory what you have to do. Excellent graphics, more enjoyable than normal manopoly!

Game has just haulted because 60 dice isn't enough to do anything in game, you can't win any tournaments because people get thousands of dice (some say through cheating but not sure if true), and everything costs too much to upgrade now. So I play everyday but nothing new is happening or motivating me to stay. Real let down, give more than a max of 60 dice so I can do something please.
column11: Hi! Sorry to hear that you seem to miss out on a great reward. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you. We also would like to encourage you to check our FAQs and look for the “Known Issues'' section where we update the status of the issues we are working on. Looking forward to hearing from you.

column9: Downloaded this as Scrabble Go is a great game. With this game here, I find these reviews very suspect as the game doesn't appear to have any actual gameplay, strategy, choices, variation or depth... Not quite sure what's going on here honestly.
Adverts and costs so annoying, a game that could be good but clearly the algorithm is based on revenue. Deleted and a waste of time.

Too much popups asking for money Too much notifications No point in adding friends because you're the first option for their attack (yeah, you can change objective but nobody pays attention to that) and the reward for adding friends is not that good.

I have over 100 monopoly boards and this game isn't like monopoly it's basicly the same as coin masters but monopoly theme you can attack other people's boards and the aim is to upgrade your city I think what would make it better is you can place houses and hotels on what you land on instead of it doing it random and if some one else lands on that property they can take a house/hotel off you or even property Upgrade chance cards and community in conjunction with the City level

Fun game, but the constant pop ups trying to get you to buy dice rolls are annoying. You also run out of dice rolls very quickly. Would be nice if there was a free way to earn more dice rolls, such as watching ads instead of paying money.

Funnest game ever, n better than Coin Master by far...win more money too! The popups are not enjoyable, however don't have to spend money n I never will on this game... it's just that, A GAME...you don't want to spend money, you don't have to...just play the game!
It was okay until the game crashed and wouldn't load. But I agree with others' reviews...it is mindless gameplay. No real challenges and lots of pop up ads to encourage you to spend real money.

The game is highly pay to play, you have to wait like 50 minutes just to roll 5 more times, and every time you load into the game, they shove tons of paid items in your face. As well as shoving all of them in your face again, once you are almost out of dice, then another time when you are completely out of dice

Defibatelyclose track of time playing this game and there's great deals for when you make first purchases. Def been neglecting other games on my phone and been stuck in this game, like a cat in a box. Lol 😆
No skill required. Run out of dice too quickly and no way to get more dice for watching ads. Nice aesthetic and runs smoothly but no game mechanics other than tap on buttons with no skill.

It's just like every other typical dice roller game. You get tons of rolls at the beginning and as you play it's like they are rationing the rolls, waiting up to an hour to roll 5 more times. Stickers and books to complete and different board themes while having the ability to rob and damage random players. But the gimmick here is it's on a monopoly board with jail and all. The community chest is a "piggy bank" type deal and you need friends to open it. Some of us don't have friends :(
Ads are so excessive, I would pay to stop the ads. There is also a bug that gets the game stuck on perpetual loop of ads without being able to proceed to the board itself.
column11: Hi! Sorry to hear the game keeps looping. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you. We also would like to encourage you to check our FAQs and look for the “Known Issues'' section where we update the status of the issues we are working on. Looking forward to hearing from you.

column9: The new update sucks. I have two accounts that have placed 3rd and 6th in the previous tournament. The game was needed to be updated so I did yet it has been hours and I still haven't gotten my rewards. For a game that requires monetary exchange for a better gameplay, the treatment for the players sure sucks. Not even an official statement from the game's page. Seriously, don't download and play this game.

Money grab, push notifications, extremely over priced packages, 10x roll good luck ever hitting a railway...its rigged. Looked forward to this sped up classic monopoly that was advertised...its nothing compared. Its a copypaste of coin master with a new look.

It is a good game. However 1 hour is way too long to grab dices. This game need to implement some way to grab dices instead of showing pop ups in front of us everytime we open the game. Also I am a little confused about the aspect of community chest. Is it the more friends you have the bigger the reward?
It's an amazing game! I'm actually addicted to this game, like GLUED. The only thing missing in my opinion is the tokens. Developers if you see this, PLEASE add more tokens! Like a cat or dog, maybe?

It's not like the average monopoly that you're used to. It's more like a personal board. You don't pay with other people but you can steal money from them and destroy their stuff. I just started playing yesterday and I'm already on the Paris Board level. Addicting!!!

Getting really annoyed, that I can't change my connection on Facebook through the game it's very annoying, I'd had this difficulty whilst trying to go to settings and disconnect my current account to connect a new one, it is very infuriating

I personally love it. People complain too much, expecting something that would challenge them, forgetting the main objective of monopoly, which is having a good time with the family. 10/10 would recommend.

This app is painful. I don't mind working for dice when I'm playing for free, but come on. if this is the business model @free - hate to see it @cost. round and round we go, complete a coloured set, get $$$, complete a tourney $$$, get a wheel spin, reward stickers 🙄 Hate the stickers. Why be tight with dice because you've removed the fun of monopoly through house rules. Adding new friends through FB link regardless of, earns neither of us dice or $$$ or stickers. Not sharing link anymore.

The game is amazing but running out of spins and waiting FOREVER for more is why I give it 1 star. It sucks you have to spend money in order to actually enjoy this game on top of waiting an hour to fill up without spending money... I don't mind spending but I'm not even winning real money.
This is a game with no purpose. You can farm your dice throws with an auto-throw option. There's no way to loose, and it looses all the essence of the original Monopoly. Really bad game.

Any game where you out of rolls in the first 20 minutes on day one is kinda silly. Like give us a day to get addicted maybe? That and feels like there's next to nothing to do. Unless more opens up as the game progresses. Probably won't find out... already out of rolls and nothing has enticed me to come back.

Easy playing, whether paying attention or not. Just gotta press buttons occasionally. Beautiful art, awesome for playing with friends or monopoly strangers for extra bonuses. Join FB page for sticker swaps.

Stuck! Game will not load after playing for a little over a day. Stuck at 10%. Turned phone off and on. Deleted and reinstslled app and still the same. Feedback here only way to report issues!!! And then no send button here
column11: Hi! Sorry to hear that you're having loading issues. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you. We also would like to encourage you to check our FAQs and look for the “Known Issues'' section where we update the status of the issues we are working on. Looking forward to hearing from you.

column9: It is really entertaining and it will take a bit to load. But the animations are great and you have to put a bit of strategy on. What you wanna take down when you get on a raiload so in case? If it's blocked then you can attack it. But if it is not then you can get money for it and you can get money for it if it's blocked also.
A fun game with too many popups asking you to spend money. I'd be more likely to spend (a small amount of) money to remove the intrusive ads than actually pay to get more dice rolls, etc.
Gets old really fast. All you'll be doing is rolling the dice and building once you have enough money but there isn't much else to it. Animations are nice and smooth but no substance to the game.

i dont like the shut down train is useless it 50/50 low or high money earning beside that its not making any sense or fun at all if you included a random card or dice for destroying your co players board base it make sense but it dosent only give you low and high money earning what the fun with that? remove it or include some additional rewards it take so many animation with no reason! its not fun at all while thinking while you need to destroy your co players base? dosent make any sense!

Hi all I can say is this game is super fun. I especially like the shutdown part it is awesome. This game is sooo cool because I love monopoly but my siblings never play with me, but maybe I can get them to play this game. The only thing I would change is the tokens can we please get some more options.💵💴💷💶💵💵💴💰💰💰💰💰💰🕴️🕴️🕴️🕴🏻

Been playing for a week & It's PAY TO WIN no doubt about it & even if you pay after awhile they screw you over. I had 1.5k dice & only got heist once & railroad 2x. Don't play trust me you'll regret it. Also the pop up to buy is annoying so frequent & none stop between every game that it's annoying now. The game also has no way to communicate with player in game or report them if they're scammers.

it's fun, the only thing I'd suggest is to stop shoving purchases down our throat. EVERY time I can't continue my dice roll bc of the multiplier or lack of dice it offers me like 4 different in game purchases. gets annoying real fast.
Don't be on automatic roll if you land on Jail! The game glitches out and no buttons will pop up and appear. Must close game out and reload it. It's frustrating.

Im really love this game there is no anoying ads to get in the way.u can also complete the boreds without make any purches for extrea dice and money .unless u get inpatient of wait for dice honestly it dont take very long..the graphics are nice and smooth to look at love the music..and if u did want to buy extrea it would not cost u a arm and and leg..recommend this to anyone
Such a good game no ads and I love it! It's really good no bugs or anything but if u run out of rolls it does take a long time to get more but it's good to get off ur phone so I love it!

I don't like that these free games are turning into little casinos. Check it you can get 30 rolls for 2 bucks. 30 rolls is gonna go in Maybe 5 minutes? Then then they throw morals out at you trying to get you to buy rolls and in order to really be good in the game. You have to spend money and that is not fun. The game is great until you run out of rolls. Then you realize it's actually not that fun because I refuse to buy rolls

I love this game so much that my whole family plays it. At first i thought we would win food until i got deeper into the game and started to play it more i got the hang of it and started to realize that we dont fpod but i think we should after the long time we played and hard work we did to build all the buildings.

Has potential.. Silly amount of ads which are placed in the hopes you accidentally purchase and spend loads of money. I was hoping this game would be similar to how it is with the option of doing normal monopoly games with friends or strangers to earn Ingame money/dice rolls. The level or style of your character in the monopoly game could have been based of your monopoly go build.

Pros: • It's a fun game. • Doesn't have any compulsory ads. • Closely linked with the actual game of monopoly. Cons: • The chance that a player likes the game is too reliant on the probability that the player has a Facebook account. • No strategy required.

This is so amazing to play, I've only just finished new York City and just started London and I'm addicted to the game already, if I could give it 10 stars I would, the game play is awesome the graphics are outstanding, guys download it you won't be disappointed

If i could sum this game up in one word i would say it's basically gambling. That's where both the good and the bad aspects of the game come from. Fun as long as you got enough to play and frustrating when you lose money for rounds.

Overall this game is quite decent from the get-go, especially since it doesn't rely on ads whatsoever, what not a lot of games can pull off, but what i do have to criticize would be the reliance on Facebook as a cloud, as your data isn't exactly safe under Facebook and i do not trust Facebook whatsoever. Another thing i have to criticize would be the popups, as they pop up quite too frequently for my liking, though overall i'd give this a 3.7 star rating, bumping this up to a 4.

So far it has been enjoyable. I'm on the third board and I haven't spent any money to get more rolls. With the three time rewards you get a money and rolls to stay relevant in the game. If you like the board game "Monopoly" I say check it out. It is a nice twist to the game.

Overall a very good game but I don't like the fact you need to wait an hour for 6 dices. They should atleast half the time for 6 dices also I think they should do the links on Facebook where it gives you free rewards every so often that way you're not sittin waiting on 6 dice but other than that I love the game just think you guys need to update the things on what I said.

Pretty crummy game. It's a copy of those other crummy games that aren't any fun. Not sure why they bothered making it, do these crapps make money? It also spams you with far too many popups to pay for things every time you run out of rolls, and your have to click the tiny X rather than just tap outside to dismiss.. Over all, just an annoying excuse of a game. I'm only playing it to earn gems for the real game I play. Avoid

Gameplay good.... Iam a paygamer in some games,harvest legendary skins and stuff like this. But paying for energy never. 95 rolls 5.99€... I roll 10 times and its gone... Toooooo expensive for me and i can easily afford it if i like to. But this is near robbery for me.....

The cool down for dice is of one hour which gives you 5 dice ANNOYING, either give more dice or reduce the timer. Can't even think of purchasing so expensive who do you think we are, if they can make few offers cheap maybe I'll make a purchase. Overall a good game fancy looking.

Don't trust this game. They steel from you. When you report the problem they ignore you and don't fix the problem. I first thought it was a bug but after reporting it two times with screen shots they replied with the same response. DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!! THEY TAKE WHAT YOU WIN AND TEMPT YOU TO SPEND MONEY. Just out there to rob you
Feels like a huge money grab! Definitely not worth it! Nothing like classic monopoly. Just have to build useless buildings and wait for hours to get spins or pay a lot of real money to buy more spins
I like it, but the time to reload dice is long. 5 rolls each hour is okay until you roll them all in 10 seconds, and then you're back to waiting. So, it's not fun in that aspect.

This game is being advertised as a true mobile version of Monopoly that you can play with your friends but it's no such game. It's almost like if clash of clans had a monopoly skin. If you like that type of gameplay, then absolutely go for it, but don't expect traditional monopoly.

It's 95% copy of board kings & coin master combined with just a few different things but it's basically just a clone of those games it's f2p but relies heavily on waiting for the dice so imo it's a waste of time 10hrs waiting for dice for 2 mins of game time. Pure waste of time unless you spend a fortune buying more dice. Uninstalling 5mins after it just came out.

It's just an annoying money grab...u start off strong...then suddenly u get nothing. You have no spins left...can't get shields...constantly attacked...then like magic a pop up ad...where u only gotta spend $2 n get more stuff...n u buy it n lose everything in 5 mins...avoid this like it's herpes.
It sort of just... exists? No skill, no game at all, just rolling dice endlessly until something happens. I don't get the point. Oh and the pop ups are SO annoying and way too frequent.

Great game. But please STOP WITH THE POP UP PURCHASES. It is pretty annoying when I finish using all my rolls and then get a pop up purchase for more rolls. This would be a forcing force for me to leave the game and not recommend it

It could be a fun little game to kill time on but it's almost as I'd the developers don't want you to actually play the game...it takes so long to get rolls it's ridiculous, Clearly it's "Don't play our game unless you give us money 🤑🤑🤑"
Besides the fact that its pay to get to the top of the leaderboards its a good game so far. Honestly no point in having a leaderboard since you can pay your way. Not really competitive.

Nothing like Monopoly. As others have said, looks good, plays good, but that's where it ends. No sense of accomplishment, pay to play, and worst of all you can only play for like 30 minutes before you are asked to pay for more rolls. No thanks on this game.
I like the game, but the purchase offer pop ups are a bit much. Also, I can't link or connect to my Google account to play on another device without losing my current progress
It's such a tedious and unexciting copy of Coin master, branded with Monopoly. This style of game is just to take out any thing that makes it fun or challenging. There's no substance to it at all.

It's fun, but I don't have Facebook and I tried to connect my account through Google but it won't. I keep tapping the connect with Google button in the settings, but it won't. That's a disappointment.

The pop ups begging for your money every 5 seconds ruined this game. Also, it takes too long to get chances to roll and there is zero strategy involved. It's not even a game at that point- just an app that begs for your money.

This game looks like a cash grab. Pop ups and banners with offers are everywhere, the charging of the moves is very slow making you to buy more moves. It looked fun but all this makes the game not enjoyable.

This is no monopoly. Just a monopoly cover on a classic click to advanced-click to change map-no opponents-you play your own- suddenly everything is expensive and I need to pay to play game. This is no way monopoly. Who in god had this idea? A classic game to be turn into this monstrosity? Not worth it at all.
It's fine. No skill involved. Constantly asks for real money to roll again. Is desperate to get my list of contacts. Nice enough graphics.

The game is rigged as hell, there is almost no user "input" other than rolling the dice and setting the multiplayer. This game is just a gambling simulator but with everything rigged, please do something about it.

I'm enjoying the game so far, but the only thing I wish is that the time to get more dice rolls was a bit lower so that we could play longer. It's a bit of a bummer when you're on a roll, and all of a sudden, you run out of dice. Otherwise great game so far!👍🏻

This is THE definition of cash grab. It's nearly a copy paste of the game Board Kings and nearly has nothing to do with Monopoly other than the names and the mascot dude. It has microevents happening all of the time encouraging people to spend money to keep playing to hopefully win an event. Slow recharge times for dice as well. All boards are the same and at launch no tokens to unlock. You are literally only playing to spend money. Might as well call the currency Canadough.
Quick and easy to understand. Looks great, fast movements around the board and involves other players successfully. I shall be playing this for quite some time!

This gave is kinda fun but still many pop ups that gonna trick little kids that have there parents card linked to Google account, is identical replica of "coin master" just added a board nothing original the only thing that's original maybe bank haste but still a kid could of thought of that. Nothing like an original monopoly. Gave it 2 stars because it's still a game but still. Monopoly are you running out of money because this game is low budget

Other than the obvious and insane amount of pop ups that ask you to buy an in-app purchase, the game is pretty fun. The game generally gives a vibe of "this is an obvious money grab game from a gigantic corporation" though.

Nothing like Monopoly, it's just a huge Tycoon. To be honest it's not really that fun. The only good things about this games is that the graphics are nice. If your looking for the classic monopoly, it's not this game.

Absolute rubbish. I was hoping this was just going to be classic monoply that I could play in my spare time with some bots but instead its a game that looks like monoply and is rubbish. How difficult is it for a game like that? Do yourselves a favor and dont get this.

I love monopoly it is my favorite game and this one is absolutely amazing and so much fun. Problem when I tried to play today april 17 it wouldn't load the game and stopped at 33%. I am not sure what is going on but I know it is not my internet connection. Please fix.
column11: Hello! We are sorry to hear about your gaming experience. This was an issue affecting many players and our game team already managed to resolve.

column9: I like the graphics on the game. It's just missing be able to go inside. Be nice if they had like mini slots if you could go inside the building. I guess I just have a good imagination.

Update! Game will only load to 33% today! It's fully updated and worked yesterday. After a couple of minutes the notice comes: "No internet connection found", it's telling me that as I post this on the internet that it can't find
column11: Hi there! It’s always a pleasure to hear that our effort has created a satisfying experience for a Monopoly enthusiast. We are really happy to hear that you enjoy the game!

column9: I admit it was fun at the beginning but as I progress missions and reward are hard to attain. I paid for extra rolls to achieved missions and stickers but to no avail, still nothing! landmark are so pricey and the dices rolls I think is pre programmed coz it seldom roll to needed spaces after so many rounds and money spent. So frustrating. If you plan too install it be ready to be frustrated. It's a complete rip off.

I like the game but it has 2 problems. 1. You can't change the profile picture. 2. Why do you have limited dice rolls? Once you finish your rolls, you're just stuck for 1+ hours until It'll give you free rolls! Pls fix this, then I'll give you 5 stars.

Definitely rigged. You land on Free Parking, Just Visiting, Chance, Community Chest, and Tax spaces WWAAAYYYY more often than any other spaces. Using up all your rolls, trying to get you to spend money in order to keep playing and advance! I am unistalling the game today. Honestly, nothing but greed from the developers, just do a true randomized dice roll!

I started the game and got through my first set of rolls and now its telling me im stuck. I have no choice but to go into build but it tells me i dont have enough money. So im stuck in a stand still at the very start of the game and i have a screenshot to prove it.

absolutely nothing like actual monopoly, there's no fun to this its just pushing one button all the time and when you do land on something its the same thing all the time. Its extremely repetitive and get so boring. I dont recommend this game to anyone as it is not what it said.

Overall a solid game. It feels very similar to Board Kingz, but has its own unique twist to it. Wish it'd let me use the community chest without having to have 5 friends added. It's definitely nice to play this game to pass the time.
Not user friendly. Unable to turn off the annoying sounds. A basic feature such as sound should be easily accessible.
column11: Hi there. We would like to confirm that you can easily turn off the game's sound and music through the in-game settings. Hope this helps. If it doesn't work, please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you!

column9: Fun. Humorous animation. Great sound effects. And I love that I can set it on auto roll, which makes playing this at work even more easier!!

READ. This is NOT a Monopoly game. It just use that name and theme as a title. You literally just keep the center button pressed, wait till the money filled, click on the fixed location to cash out the money. Repeats. That's it. Don't waste your time on this.

Paid for the dice rolls but got nothing. A pop up saying "internet connection failed, purchase unsuccessful", However, money was minus off my account. Contacted the customer service, but there is no response. The game is fun and addicting tho. Hope this can be resolved :)

Ok game. Honestly I'm not surprised it's another pay to win. Run out of rolls by the third map. Takes to long to return rolls. And then to lose them so quickly. By the time I use them up again. Everyone has the cookie in the jar...could be better.

Mind-numbingly boring is the best way I can describe it. As another reviewer mentioned, this game involves zero strategy and a lot of clicking. Just a very weird PvP game that shouldn't be tarnishing the original Monopoly's reputation as a very fun game.

Ahh the nostalgia here is amazing. Monopoly was always a game that never ended as a kid. Kind of a messed up game teaching kids to monopolize the board and force their friends to fork over cash for passing by their business. But gotta love it as a test of time a game that never dies.

Simplistic but nice and relaxing. Love it. Ok I have taken a star off because of the constant loading of this game. 95% of the time if I switch back to it the game has to reload from scratch which is very annoying. Even a game like Pokemon go doesn't do that on my phone.
Absolute fail of a Monopoly game. I have more fun playing marbles with my little cousin. I may keep the app incase the developers decide to improve it, but this game is a waste of time.

Terrible cashgrab. Just wants you to spend to keep playing. Features locked behind annoying your friends into playing this game. Barely enough gameplay to justify them trying to take money out of your wallet. Don't even bother installing.

At one point they put 5 pop-ups i had to click out of because i ran out of dice like holt sh... Also this is not monoply you just press ONE BUTTON... You do not play vs other people and there is no ai! Yes thats right you just go around the board by yourself collecting money!!! How fun also no placing buildings haha who needs any interaction on your part JUST SWIPE PLEASE
So far surprisingly aint what I was expecting but its quite new concept and I love a surprise adventure on a board game . Cool graphics, everything seems to be 10/10 so far so great work.

The game is ok, my big gripe with it is the massive amount of micro-transaction screens that pop up. Just make it 1 screen, otherwise you're just wasting my time and that will get you a 1 star rating.

Exactly like coin master!! I was expecting to play the actual board game with friends and actually challenge streets, paying rent and building hotels. Gaining and losing money but no. Waste of time, in my opinion 😒

Really fun take on dice games! I love monopoly so it's fun to have it all incorporated into it and still keep me entertained! Plenty of tournaments and challenges to get you more dice cause it takes a while to refill your rolls

Very playable free game. Gives you alot to start with and is very charming. Holds your hand every step of the way. Run out of roles and it will make it obvious it wants you to spend money to keep playing. 🤑

This "game" is trash. Rolls are limited to get you to spend money. There are popups every 10 seconds. No reason to progress. They just want you spending money, that's it. These devs are toxic and are helping destroy the gaming industry.

The ONE and ONLY reason I am uninstalling this beautiful game is because of the horrible, aggressive and intrusive vibration while I am watching videos, scrolling or just relaxing. The game is off,all sounds and notifications are off,but when someone robs me or attacks me,it keeps on vibrating!! Uninstall!!!
