I would say I like it but I can't because I freaking love it so it is definitely the best Monopoly Go game I've ever played and one of the best games so far yet I played on Android thank you for the game to the developers and if you can send me some free dice please and I'll keep writing five star five-star 5 store tennis door if I could thank you guys appreciate it and don't forget to send me my free dice thank you love you long time oh and did I say thank you to the developers for the game🙏

Fun to begin with and than it is just repetitive, no sense of accomplishment ever since. Well you run out of dice and protection. Either you spend money to protect your buildings from destruction or wait maybe 10 years for the dice to recover and when you rebuild them you get smashed again.
In app purchases too in your face. Fun game but being prompted twice to buy rolls when you run out is too much. Other than that it's a fun take on the monopoly franchise.

It's got potential this game. I love how monopoly go is similar to that other game that I play but it's still has the monopoly board feel to it. 5 🌟. I would like to see cheaper deals for buying purchases in the game and like multi-player 2 or more players Co op. Where u can be a team or clan and destroy stuff.
Installed on my Chromebook and the app won't load. It gets to the part where the accept the Terms & Conditions then quits. Tried 3 times. If you have a Chromebook don't download this app.

The game is really fun and when you get up to Sandpoint you can also spend just like coin master but the only thing that bothers me is if you lived on a place it's not like anyone will not be Monopoly Wii u have an option to buy it or not that's the only problem that I have with it but it's Still a five out of five
Bright colorful graphics & cheerful, non-irritating music & sound effects. Fun little game for anyone nostalgic for the original board game. So far ... I like it 👍

Great game I play every day,, it took me a while to work out how to Play the game to my advantage,,I only gave 4 stars cos when I land on jail the game will freeze while playing the 3 spins so I have to force close the game,, maybe you can fix this I have a pixel 6 pro

Fun game. But the in-app purchase popups are driving me nuts. Would easily give 4+ stars otherwise, but everytime you've completed the rolls you're asking for money. Once a day, fine. But not every damn time!

Pop ups don't bother me to much, what does bother me is u run out of rolls way to fast and as soon as u do u get a pop asking if u want to buy more rolls! I'm not spending my hard earned cash just to roll the dice!! It took me less than 5 mins to use my rolls thismorning now I have to wait for the rest of the day to get another 5 mins worth of rolls, no thanks! Other than that it's quite an enjoyable game!

Not a big fan of video game board games but this is pretty dang fun , I remember people telling me don't fix it if it's not broken. as of right now I think this game is great , give it some time before you make changes please.

Watch random numbers with no input. This isnt a game. You have no choices, no strategy, no input. You can even have it roll for you so you just watch it play. No choices it gives you make any difference other than if you'll spend real money or not.

I dont get why i need dice to keep playing. Game is cool and fun but once you got no dice its like well when i actually play monopoly my dice dont go anywhere so why is this even a feature. Im not ever paying for dice so i can keep rolling but its dumb. Its monopoly with a stupid limit. I somehow ran out of dice now i got like 5 ads constantly being annoying wanting me to buy dice. Soon im going to uninstall and just play the board game monopoly where my dice dont "run out". ridiculous imp

I enjoy this game! It's so fun, and I love the idea of having to destroy others' buildings or steal their coins. 🤣👌🏼the only annoying thing about this game is the pop-up ads when I run out of dice. Please work on that. I hate spamming ads.
For the moment you open an app. I've counted 7 pop-ups and as soon as you run out of dice it gives you another three pop-ups ridiculous constant pop-ups
A good version of the coin master game. That adds to the experience with a monopoly theme. Got exactly what I expected to get and a bit more.

I can't stop playing.i really enjoy this. Fun and new twists on the old game keep it interesting. My only complaint is run out dice too quick. You should be able to buy dice with gold.not pay for a pack.

As soon as I joined I got a good walk through one of the best parts of the game , however as the add says " it's monopoly but on the go" this game has the board but nothing else about monopoly other than the name and the character.

This game has ruined my friendships. It's never ending the shut down the bank robbing it's not something that can be taken lightly. This is not a game for kids it's a grown ups game and it's honestly not even a game it's a tournament to see who it'd the strongest. Who is the best. I love this tournament with all of my heart
Incredibly dull. No actual game play. Constant pop ups wanting ridiculous amounts ofoney for extra rolls. Not worth downloading. It's no more a game than any of the idle clickers.

It's not a bad game if you like these type of games. I'm not really into these types of games.. but it's a lot like coin master, although I like this way of playing it better if that helps. I still give it a 4 star, because just because it isn't my cup of tea, it might be someone else's.

Very boring. By watching the ad I thought It would be like real monopoly but online. I think it was a bad move making a game like this when so many others like this are made and probably more popular.

The push for microtransactions are utterly brutal. Pretty much after every dice roll it's "Wanna pay $1.99 for 10 rolls and a couple hundred thousand dollars?" Or "Are you sure? We're having a deal right now for $3.99 for 50 rolls and 1 million dollars." If anything will make me uninstall this app, it's the brutal push to make money constantly

The game was good at first but by the 3rd level it slowed down considerably. It takes 1 hour just to receive 5 dice to be able to roll 5 times then when your out of dice you have to wait another hour to receive 5 more dice. That's a long time of not getting hardly anywhere.

Poor customer service. Add friends and no rewards, buy the pack and no items. Messaged customer service, 2 days later and do you think I ever got a response ? Not so much as a fkn automated response. Scopley is nothing but a cash grab. Avoid this fkn company and its games at all cost.
So far so good it has spacky interest, but it's to be determined. So far it the amount of spins it givess you vs how long you have to wait just for 1. But, we'll be back for that later.

Honestly this game is so fun, making money, owning countrys, stealing people's money, it's just really fun lol, plus it's virtual so you can take money without feeling guilty by destroying buildings and stuff, if any of yall reading this, play it, it's really fun and a great way of becoming a virtual billionaire, millionaire, etc,
I love this game. The only feedback I have is about the dice. It would be good to use x10 or higher to the end and not get a pop up so often when you run out of dice.
Game is good, but stop irritating with pop ups when the roll is over. It's frustrating everytime you need to close the offers. STOP WITH THE IRRITATING POP-UPS 🤬
It's a ripoff of board kings, but it's way worse. If you played this game and were interested In the concept but really didn't enjoy it, try board kings, it's actually pretty fun.
for the beginning it’s very good, I’ve been playing for more than 20 minutes and I’m not tired yet :). most importantly without annoying ads. for start 5 stars.

Fun game, enjoyable and interactive but waiting 1hr for 5 dice is really discouraging me from playing 😞 improvement is needed on the issuing of dice rolls within the game. It's hard to get more dice when u need dice to win the challenges. Please work on dice rolls increase 🙏
I have a Chromebook & I can't get past the terms agreement without it crashing. I have uninstalled & reinstalled but it continues to shut down completely.
column11: Hi there. We're sorry to hear that the game does not work properly. You could try to clear the cache, restart the device and ensure that enough memory is available. We hope one of these works for you. If not, please contact us at monopoly-go-support@scopely.com.

column9: I'm having a bad experience at the moment it keeps not letting me play it keeps saying an error occurred I even restarted my phone and all sorts and still saying the same thing is there a problem with it or something because it never happened before
column11: Hello, we apologize that you are experiencing connection issues with the game. Please try reinstalling the game and restarting your device. If that doesn't work, please contact us at monopoly-go-support@scopely.com with your account information and any relevant screenshots so that our support team may assist you. Thank you.

column9: It's a blend of other games available right now (Board Kings & Coin Master), but with a Monopoly twist. I just started playing so we'll see how long this lasts...so far so good.
Just started playing. So far so good, haven't encountered any issues, graphics are good and gameplay is smooth.

No ads and you get to do other things than go around a board. You get a limited rolls but after you run out just go build with the money you got and get more dice. You keep getting other places this games the best.

Just dumb fun. Imma give 'em some money later. You don't really need to spend money to be entertained by this game. But they do deserve something for building this dumbly fun game. It's a good game to use to pass a bit of time during the day.

I dont recommend playing this game through offerwall. I have reached board 11 like I had to and never got my reward and that was 2 days ago. If you want people to play your games through offerwall quit screwing them over especially after I sent a screenshot with proof.

Good game but does have a few to many pop ups each time you log in. It DOES how ever need MORE TRADES!!! 5 every 24 hours is no where near enough and many of us are trying to get certain cards to compleate sets.

This game requires no skill or intelligence. I have played many games for a cash grab in the past this is not only dull and repetitive but should you achieve the target they refuse your awards with no reason. 50% of the games I have played previously I still play and am prepared to pay for this is not one
Love the game, the little details are everything, loving that there are hardly ever any ads, and the graphics are amazing and so adorable!💛
When you run out of dice you see 4 adds to buy more one right after another. A 1/4 of the screen is taken up by small circles that half of them are adds

Invited 3 people to play this, all 3 of which clicked the link provided by the in game invite system, yet none of the rewards have been awarded to me, even though I watched click the link and install using my link I sent. It's definitely bugged and needs to be looked at

2 minutes of playtime every hour and annoying 3 popups everytime you run out of dice is not my idea of a fun relaxing game. The graphics are nice but the game is just a pointless money grab. Why no free dice links on Facebook?
So far it's been fun to play an upgraded game of Monopoly on my phone. No issues so far with gameplay & the graphics are cool.

It's an enjoyable time killer but you need to have Facebook or apple to save. So if you are like me playing on an Android and don't have a Facebook you will lose your progress if you delete or get a new device.

Monopoly Go you really need to sort your friends link out. I sent to multiple friends and they all think I've been hacked and have been reporting my account as being hacked as the link looks lame and dodgy. They've all been afraid to click it and I don't blame them. You need a link with the Monopoly Go picture or at least Monolpoly Go in it. So far no friends have joined and Facebook think I've been hacked, great! You need 5 friends to join to open the community chest so need a decent link.

Just played real monopoly yesterday and I loved it so much I had four places but I sold one or two for railroads and another yellow which gave me colour set and I placed three hotels and this game just you with out giving turns on guest but yet again it's still fun 100000% you should play if you like monopoly.

This game is so much fun. Monopoly is my # 1 favorite game to play, but it's hard to get friends and family together to play. With Monopoly Go I don't have to wait for my people to play. I get to play when I want to and I get to play my favorite game everyday! The game does have the option to pay to get parts that you need, but so far I've been able to play and not pay and that is important because sometimes money is not available to put towards a game. I am loving this game!

Decent enough game. The number of pop-ups asking you to spend real money is absolutely ridiculous. You shouldn't ever encourage people to spend money on a game. And some of the prices are extortionate too.

Could be a great game if wasn't so pay to play orientated unless you buy dice you only receive 5 every hour pretty rubbish considering they can be used in 2 shots. Even giving 10 an hour or 5 every 30 mins would prob make more people drop a couple quid here and there. Just a suggestion devs

Don't like how you don't get nothing for fee parking 😒 most of the time and it takes a log time just to get five 🙄 dice and the community chest all bad like why do I need friends just to open it and then I got to wait 24 hours. I paid money to play but definitely going to uninstall
It's fun, but in-game communication for trade transaction would make it better for trading cards. No point in having friends you play with if you can't communicate in game.
It's Monopoly in a push the button mode. But I do love to open different sites. Smashing people's building that I'm not sure about. Still playing though
This is such a good game that the only negative thing is needing WiFi to play. In a busy house WiFi can be slow which makes th gme slow but other than that. Great game.
Literally just a worse version of Board Kings. Incredibly boring and repetitive and lacks the fun visuals and minigames that makes Board Kings fun.

Takes too long to for dice to accumulate. There are not enough opportunities to win dice. This is pretty much a play for pay game. That takes the fun out of it. Would also be better if it was a multi-player game as well.

It's very interesting, entertaining, and fun to play. I didn't think I would like it at first, but, now I find myself playing everyday. My advice to anyone is to play it once or twice and then decided if you like it. Give it a chance. You won't be disappointed!!!!!!!

I like to play but an hour wait for five rolls is ridiculous and the time it takes to accumulate so you can play max rolls is beyond comprehension. No other game I play has this wait length they need to change this.
Very fun, good way to waste away time when you've got nothing better to do and I don't really have a problem with any ads either so one of the top mobile games in my opinion.
This is a good game to play when you have some spare time. I like monopoly anyway but now you can build in different cities around the world, makes it much more interesting.

Time on waiting for Dice is super unnecessarily long and I think is purposely done to make up pay for dice rolls due to the amount of micro transaction pop ups there are . It takes 1 hour for 5 dice and its extremely annoying, please give more dice or shorten the time . This makes game play unbalanced.

Familiar concept with scandalously high prices for dices, which will be used up so fast. You'll struggle, once you've colletec all dice rewards. But without dices, your chances are low even receiving these said rewards. It'll lead to a frustration to get you paying in order to advance. Collecting stickers can be a tedious process without a proper trading system or clans. And guess what? It'll be your many source of dices in the future, except for either paying or waiting hours to roll.
This game was described as the regular usual monopoly but it isn't. I'm disappointed that you guys had to lie to get us to download the game. This is an insane level of clickbait
This is literally identical to Board Kings, but with the Monopoly brand skin. Another money grab and the game play is monotonous. I had higher hopes for this one.
While a good way to kill time getting boring quickly. I never lose and it may seem great, but having 700 rolls gets annoying.
It's a good game of you can play for long periods of time and are okay with repetitive things. Almost no ads. Please ge this game!

I have no problem at all with the game itself as a matter of fact I think that it is great. It just pains me,because I know of a very similar game that was created by a much smaller franchise. I am not pointing any fingers, but it just seems slightly suspicious.
Love it. But it's not your classic monopoly and the pop ups. All in all very pretty and smooth play no glitches.
Love the game. Except the fact that it rips me out of dice at times when landing on the dice. And I think it shouldn't cost so much for dice as they go to quickly
It's a good game to play digitally. Much different from the actual board game but great graphics and story lines to follow.
I'm n Paris now and I'm enjoying the game. When I run out of dice I just wait until I get a notification I have enough to continue. I love the visuals n sounds..Very fun game!
Love this game, except it takes forever to get rolls. If you'd make it faster than 5 an hour, that would be great. I'm afraid I'll lose Interest from all the waiting.
Love the game I just got done with London plus there's barley any ads which I love. There are lag spikes when you are about to do a heist or something but most of all I love it. Keep it up

I have to change my review. At first, I enjoyed this game. It's fun and relaxing for me. There's bugs but still tolerable. The problem is, those bugs keep happening. I reported it to customer service, but got no reply.

Love this game, but think it would be even better if you could make a competitive version just like the board game, where you can play with other players and have their pieces on the board at the same time. That would be even better.

Fair game play, seems to go into a go to jail and pay taxes mode every 6-10 trips around the board. Seems you roll, land on jail, have to pay fine, then hit all the taxes tiles your next trip around the board, I'm done being hosed by this game...

I couldn't even get past the opening, got stuck during the on boarding screen saying "let me show you how monguls like us stay rolling in dough", with a white glove pointing you to tap on an X which is clearly a hint... But you tap it and nothing happens?
column11: Hello there! We are sorry to hear that you're having some issues loading the game. Most performance-related issues can be resolved with some basic troubleshooting. If these steps didn't help, please contact our support team at monopoly-go-support@scopely.com so that we can better assist you.

column9: Not a bad game hopefully it'll keep being good and not one of those games thats fun and easy at the start and then becomes impossible to complete later.
Sooo much fun great graphics and you can play as little or as much as you want. The only thing I don't get is how it chooses who you heist from or is it suppose to be random

Best small game of monopoly in India only few people know about this game .In India this game is known as business i know there are many differences between monopoly and business but monopoly is best . Business is a game in India Disclaimer.Thank you.I hope you will reply my mail and tell me more about monopoly.Thanks

I'm playing as part of an offer for the JustPlay app and for some reason these people did not allow me to receive the reward for reaching Board 11 in the game! Now, that part of the offer seems to have been rejected! Not happy!

This games is so fun! You can steal from other people and they can steal from you but if they steal from you don't worry you canalways steal from them. You try to build different places to get more money. And that is why I like this games.
Took 2 stars away as I keep going on to find my buildings have been attacked, but yet I still have shields left also?? Think there may be some glitch somewhere needing fixed

Open game > 5 pop ups asking you to spend money. Run out of rolls > 5 more pop ups asking you to spend more money. Cash grab is insane. Game would be OK if it didn't spam you with 10x pop-ups for purchase more rolls at a time.

Im giving this game one star due to the EXTREMELY POOR CUSTOMER SERVICES!!!! I had 5 friends join from invite noticed I was not receiving my credits or rewards i message the so called customer service. They have a bot respond after explaining your issue the bot ask for a 24hr wait period for a response it's been 2 whole days later with nothing even after sending new messages i feel cheated and having people download and join to see nothing in return
Nice game very hilarious 🤣, love it when I get I. The train and start doing some damage, graphics are excellent, overall it's a great game.
Fun game, very entertaining. Even though rewards are great on every board it gets too expensive too soon to complete them!
It seems as if it could have potential. But as for now, it's brainless time killer with nothing to do with real Monopoly. Needs serious improvement.
Great game; Extreme bias. You are unable to sign in using Google and receive no bonus if you do. But nooooooo, Apple and Facebook users get that bonus. How utterly pathetic.
It's better then playing the classic way. It would be easier to get friends when I connected to Facebook. My family don't play games on their phones
Just started playing last night on my daughter's recommendation. It's fun, fast, in app purchases. Great graphics, works well on Android and IPad.
Love the game. At first, it seemed kinda lame till my wife and son started playing. Now we trade cards and attack each other's boards. It's a great game to play with friends.

Aye asap asap.. my game buggin. I rolled on shut down and its not allowing me to click any of the opponents buildings to destroyed. Cant even get out the screen. So help!! Cause mans got money to make. These foos owing rent and someone gotta pay!!!
I absolutely love this game!! And you can actually play it a ton without having to buy anything, unlike most games!! Would definitely recommend to family and friends!!!
Good but when you roll the dice with a x2,x3,x5 or x10,it uses the multiplier to roll when it is meant to be for all rewards. Can you fix it please?
I've always loved monopoly in general, I have so many different monopoly games that it's crazy. This game among the other monopoly game that I play on my phone both games are awesome.

Love it but waiting an hour for 5 dice is lame af. I could even get behing 5 dice every 15 or 30 mins, but an hour makes me wanna rage delete. It could be raised to 20 per hour. 5 dice is about 1-2 minutes of gameplay....
Your latest upgrade is very bad. All the graphics are black. It doesn't respond to clicks. Do something about it or I delete the game.
column11: Hi! We are sorry you are experiencing some visual issues and locks as of late. We are working to fix any issue and we are always available to help you improve your gaming experience. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you!

column9: It's very addictive and fun. it just sucks when you run out of rolls and have to wait for them to reload or purchase some

there is no way to collect safety vest or big reward..monopoly go just give you few days to collect them and get the reward 40 to 200 its ok but 500 and more not a chance if you have 3 day or few hours to complete..you got to wait in hour your next more and have more dice to roll..i give 1 star rank..

The sad thing is that this is kind of a fun game. But no game is worth the endless pop-ups asking for money. Not only that but half your screen is going to be covered in these requests with no way to remove them.
This game is such a thrill ride. I literally be checking my phone throughout the day to see who either took money or tried to shut down a landmark. Very addictive of I must say.
Overall, very good game. Great graphics and a lot of fun to play. The ads aren't bad, just selling game boosts.
This is nothing like Monopoly other than capitalizing on the name and look. It's basically a slot simulator without looking like a slot machine and it's begs more than your local church for cash.
Game fails to load claims no Internet connection when it manages to load more than 10% of the game. Even when I switch to mobile Internet still refusing to load. So this game is going to be deleted

column9: My wife and I love this game but... Why must we wait 1 hour for only 5 rolls... That's a little ridiculous and why can't we request rolls from friends on the game... If it weren't for those issues I'd rate this 5 stars
The game is interesting it's the bugs when purchasing that make me say it's not worth the time. And customer service take forever to answer.

The experience could be better if we could replay boards after completing them , and if the game wasn't hitting you so hard with advertising to spend money when this game is obviously aimed at children
This is just dice dreams for monopoly.. the pop up are excessive and there is no real game play as all you do is roll dice. There is no accomplishments and the levels are repeats.
Fun game, absolutely no complaints, several of people I know are on the game so it's fun to play against them. No ads fun. Move at your own pace fun. Love it!
Ive been playing for ten minutes and im so happy i downloaded. The graphics are good the gameplay is fun, and no ads? AND its not pay to win. Download its 100% worth it
This game is fun for an hour. Once the dice rolls slow down there is not much to do. It is great for killing a few hours when bored.
Fun game, but 4-5 pop-up notifications/ads/deals every time I launch the game is very annoying. Uninstalled!!
Fun game ! This is my first board game ! I like the fact there are not a lot of adverts and graphics and sound rock ! Great job !!! 👍
Fun Game, but... The many "give us money" pop-ups when you launch the game and run out of dice rolls is insanely annoying.
Not monopoly. And sinceraly, don't even grasp how it is supposed to be played, if not just by tapping roll and see things go automatically.

+1 Star only because is good on UX and Design and of course for exchange feature. -1 Star because 6Dices/1 hour is so little.( Suggest 1 Dice/ 1 Minute. -1 Star because is Unlimited Levels with nonsense way. -1 Star because i can not learn real Monopoly game in this game. -1 You shpuld spend real money if you want to level up
I've sent stickers to other players but they're not receiving them which makes me look like a scammer and I don't appreciate that. I DID CONTACT THEM IN GAME AND HAVE TO RECEIVE A RESPONSE!
column11: Hi there. Sorry to hear that your friend is not receiving the Sticker that you are sending. We highly suggest that you have him/her contact us in-game together with both of your User IDs so that we can better assist both of you. Looking forward to hearing back from you guys.

column9: It is a nice twist to a classic game. I am not a fan of having to purchase items to continue to play or to advance in the leadership boards.
This game is amazing because you like playing the old game but on the phone and destroyed people buildings and steal their money. I love it so much.

I like the game itself but I'm rating 1 star because of the straight up predatory IAP behaviour. You can barely do anything in the game without at least 3 pop ups for the latest in app purchase. I understand the game has to make money but this is excessive. Please tweak the frequency at least.
I'm a big fan of monopoly and play this casually. I'd play it more but the constant spam really ruinds the flow of fun for me. I get it you want my money..... rolls 🙄.

Make gold cards tradeable!!! Please for God's sake. That's the most frustrating part. People won't generally keep their work with sending stickers and then we simply can't finish sets cause golds not tradable. Please, change it. 🙏
I like the game... it fun and keeps me busy, but I would like to get daily gifts. There are some things going on with the app, and it won't let me get them through Facebook

Tho it is amazing and fun game, I do like the classic one and the pop-ups are simply just too much, there are people who simply don't like to spend money on something like this or at least not too much money
So far it is working okay but it's very automatic (you don't really get to do anything as the player) and because I am still at the start everything seems to be working on my favour.
The game is very fun to play anywhere and with your friends, but wished there were a full screen.
It is basically the same as board kings if you ever played that game. It is fun to pass the time though. No skill involved whatsoever.
Mine gets stuck on the loading screen at 10%, haven't even been able to play it :/ I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling but 'no dice'
column11: Hi! We are sorry you are experiencing some loading issues. We are working to fix any issue and we are always available to help you improve your gaming experience. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you!

column9: A new twist on an old standby. Totally awesome.Always buying building and stealing. Its the American way. Excellent game.
Too many pop ups asking for money Makes the game unenjoyable Not challenging enough. There is no strategy. Not like real monopoly. A bit of a let down
You'll spend all day building up 1 landmark just to come back an hour later and see it smashed down. 1 step forward 3 steps back, impossible to advance.
Stupid amount of ads. No real point to the game, no strategy, no competition, nothing like the original... Don't bother downloading it
It takes entirely to long to get more dice to play. And the method for card trading needs a lot a work and I do mean a lot.
I love this game so much! It's different than real monopoly, but it's great! It's not that hard but it's still some amount of hard to where it's really entertaining!
A whole lot of fun. I love that they add on so many other little games mixed together. It adds numerous ways to earn dice.
Dice run out too fast and take long to replenish. Should be able to trade gold stickers as well. Don't need multiple if you can't trade them.
You cannot play with others unless you have a Facebook account. Also, I just wanted to play Monopoly, this has all other sorts of nonsense in it that have nothing to do with Monopoly.

The customer service button does not work and the app and on top of removing friends you should also have a option for reporting them for scamming especially if you're trading cards I love this game but that needs to change

Gamers don't bother it's all about how much money thay can make off the game there was a glitch I won't 1k of dice and it wasn't added to my total I messaged the game customer service with not reply aleast coin master reply back iv installed the game not worth your time
Can't get away from the special offers >:( game is fine, other than it trying to sell me rolls every 2 seconds. Fix that.
Monopoly but like coin master or thug life. Fun for hours, and if you enjoy playing the other games I mentioned and enjoy playing Monopoly, then you will enjoy this game.
I enjoy playing the game finding out where I land when shutting down someone landmark and heist.. however trading stickers is a hard task to do.
I was first in a tournament and I waited for it to be over and didn't even get my rewards!!! Im lvl 1000 and this is what happens????!!! Will be uninstalling if bug not fixed.
column11: Hi there! Thanks for playing Monopoly Go! We are aware of this issue with the Tournament rewards sometimes being delivered late and are working to fix it soon. You can always check our "Known Issues" FAQ to check the status of the issue and reach out to our Customer Support team should you wish to have it further checked.

column9: The game was interesting until this new update.. I can't even play it by more because it's showing black background and nothing works in the game.
column11: Hello there! We are sorry to hear that you're having some visual issues in-game. Most performance-related issues can be resolved with some basic troubleshooting. If these steps didn't help, please contact our support team at monopoly-go-support@scopely.com so that we can better assist you.

column9: Unless you're willing to spend money to get more rolls, this game is a dud. To only get five rolls after an hour is ridiculous. I get that the developers want to make money, but come on. I'm already bored.
It's fun but just like others with a different name. Needs more rewards for dice, instead of pushing for purchases.
This is a different twist for Monopoly. I love the graphics. Keeps me wanting to keep playing for hours.
It's OK. Dice king is still better at Maps packs and prices. Monopoly Go has Terrible map packs and the dice regeneration is way to slow and not many to roll with.

It's so fun to hit ppl house and take their money but when they get u back they come back harder this game is so fun to play with friends but let me tell u smthn if u not have friends in the game then u will not get anything happen to u and it will be very easy to play and if u have friends in the game it will be hard and so much fun
Enjoying it very much. But I'm really not enjoying how I could have 14 rolls left an I roll once an they all just disappear. Really needs to be fixed.

The word "go" is only referring to the starting tile. It's not a geo location game like pokemon go. It's pretty much copy paste from another circle your own board app, just with the monopoly brand sprinkled in. Very annoying pop up ads.

Once you have one bad day on the game it lasts forever. You need to stay on top of the leaderboard ( which is determined by luck & has bots that just inilate you ) otherwise you dont get enough spins to be able to play the game with any sort of chance of progressing.. also the card albums are just a joke i have 112 / 135 different cards & now it just wont give me the ones i need to complete the album & theres only 6 days left & its not possible to even get more cause i only get 6 spins.
A great game. Y'all need to fix the glitch for the competitions. I just came 12th and didnt receive my 50 dice or cash or stickers.
Well it's amazing. I just wish the Dice refresh upgrades weren't sad. The pay to play ppl stay on top. No room for the little people

It's ok - when you open/finish a game you get 20000000 pop ups and it's so frustrating!!!!!! If the Devs are reading this - please stop!!!!! - you have to wait ages for dice so the flow of the game is slow unless you pay.......
Way to much animation every roll takes forever cause of all the stuff happening its annoying and cant skip threw anything and how is is this a strategy game you do nothing
Too many pop up ads and we should be able to message our friends. Like a small chat box for friends to communicate.

Really fun but can't seem to play with friends without Facebook which I don't have. Won't let me sign in using Google for some reason so just playing as a guest for now. Would make it 5 stars if I can play with friends without connecting to Facebook
Not bad for some quick entertainment, but be prepared to shell out some big bucks if you wanna come out on top... Overall first impression is at least 1 thumb up 👍
I really enjoy this game, the pop ups can't be a little extreme at times, buy this, buy that but the overal experience is ok.
Awful, boring and repetitive. The game is full of bots and notification trying to make you guy spins. Nothing interesting about this, uninstalled
The graphics quality is amazing!! There's literally 0 adds and this thing is soooooo damn smooth like there's no lag at all. Worth a download!!

Tricked by the good reviews. The game is so shallow it's incredible. The game play loop is literally just pressing one button. At least other clickers let you upgrade how much money you get per click? Or have other mechanics? Such a bad "game".
This is NOT monopoly. The most boring game I have ever downloaded. I gave 2 stars because the animations and graphics are good and there are no ads.
The game is very fun but if you have any problems like don't have Facebook and need to swap your game over to a new phone the developers do not seem to care because they still have not contacted me

The gameplay is fun, very much similar to the monopoly that we used to play ,except in this case we won't lose any of the game pieces that comes in the box. Very nostalgic and I'm enjoying it very much.
Been playing for a few days it's a good game but needs a few tweaks like being able to send gifts and swap cards with your friends. Also to see when your friends are online and off
Some Bug is ruining the game. Whenever I get a Shutdown chance the page gets stuck and couldn't click any option. Right side top corner blinking like a glitch.
Everytime you open the app, run out of rolls or anything else you get 3 or 4 ads fired at you all at once. Can't play the game because the ads for IAP are constant and intrusive.
This is a good game and alot of fun to play with my friends, I gave 4 because it is almost exactly like board kings so it is hardly original. But still good either way

This game is only you against bots and if you want you can add friends but you have to send a link to do it, the leaderboard is fake, when you get higher up, the bots get more stuff than you which makes it impossible to get #1 on the leaderboard

Unless it's made better, then 1 star rating is all you will get! It literally takes FOREVER to get dice back full !!! Therefore can't enjoy the game cause once you run out of dice to roll that's it and I'm not gonna be spending money to get more!!!
play ALONE, just rolled, play faster, build empire?? cant play with anyone, hmmm..what kind of monopoly is this? i cant get it, so different with monopoly that i ever know..
I cannot believe the Outstanding Fun I am having I really appreciate the Fun I am having keep up the free rewards that you can get while traveling and playing the game!!!!!!!
There's not many games I've enjoyed, but I do enjoy Monopoly Go. It's like the real board game, and I can have as many of my friends play.

Totally addictive! Fun to play the board and build your city to move onto the next. It could have an online play feature where you actually play real life digital monopoly against friends and others globally. Buy your properties and bid each other out etc

2-4 pop ups telling me to spend real money when I get on. 2-4 pop ups telling me to spend real money when I have used all my dice after 5mins of playing. more pop ups when I run out of cash cause cash is hard to get because monuments are way too expensive as you progress and you get barely anything from the board.
I really enjoy playing this game. It's not exactly the same as the actual board with family or friends but it'll do and I get to buy way more land and it's actually pretty cool.

Great game, the visual part is fun the boards are well designed in my opinion. I would advise to give a more deep gameplay: put some notes that tell the story of the game itself/the boards, on the utilities lets pop up some mini game or do some action, make the board interactive by touching the charachters on it and they tell a story. Funny and entertaining game after all.

Micro transaction, the game! When you load the game you have to close out a micro transaction, then a 2nd. Then a 3rd. OH! You played for 30 seconds, would you like to purchase this micro transaction? OH! You have not played for 30 seconds, would you like to purchase this micro transaction? Can you invite your friends to purchase our micro transactions?

Fun game overall dice rolls are very limiting fun to bankrupt your friends and family too but that's about it pop up ads are a nightmare and you constantly run out of rolls annoying but fun perfectly describes this game

Man doesn't know that in Mauritius, all phone numbers start with 5 after country code, because right now, we don't receive the code and can't add contacts. Please, make sure this is treated as an important issue. And no, it's not fixed yet.
column11: Hi there! It’s always a pleasure to hear that our effort has created a satisfying experience for a Monopoly enthusiast. Reading your review, we understand that we still have hurdles to overcome which is something we are definitely aiming to resolve. Feel free to reach out and let us know of any additional changes you would like to see.

column9: ABSOLUTELY an amazing experience. This game is different yes but it is honestly amazing it passes the time and it's fun all the time
Loving the app in its basically a throwback to to a childhood memory!! Could e a bit better by incorporating more things to do and more options to help make this funner
Think it's a fun game, but again just like all these other app games, the prices on in app purchases are way to much for little return!! Just like Coin master, Dice Dreams an many other games.
Mindless fun! 👍 Hate all of the payments proposed for more rolls of the dice, though. I can wait. It's not THAT entertaining! 😅
Only issue I have is . Why can't I send all the cards to someone if I want to delete the game . I can only send the ones I have extra in. And 1 hour for five dice not working
Thought this would be more like the classic game, fun and some strategy involved but it's just pointless clicking and 0 skill involved. Graphics are nice, but it's just another mindless tapping game.
Very boring and stripped down to just visually monopoly. It reminds me of sitting with the game cards and just reading them for the heck if it. No nestelgia except for that.

It's a Great game but they do need to change it up a little bit, when the next update comes, 1. Can at least make them watch Ads rather than wait 1 hour to get dices. 2. Can try and send dices to players. 3. Make the Gold stickers tradeable at least can take 5 trades for the gold star.

Well it was good to play but done the update I have deleted and reinstall and update again still something it won't play it comes on and goes straight to shut down and just sits there and goes no where
It's a really good game, amd I can play it all day! Good job making this. So that people can enjoy playing Monopoly on their phone. Thank you!
The game is decent but the microtransactions constantly pop up in your face is annoying as soon your run out dice rolls. Close one down three more pop up over and over everytime.
How this is highly rated I will never know, absolutely no skills just tapping random stuff and then the amount of money it's requesting is obscene, absolute waste of time
I enjoy the game, that's why I'm giving it a 3, but they need to fix one thing the same person attacked my landmarks 25 times in a row
Boring and mindless. Monopoly is supposed to have some strategy and decision making. This is nothing like Monopoly. Disappointing
Fun game. Simple. Get your monopoly fix with this app. No real $ needed unless u r addicted to rolling dice LOL. Very nice graphics. Enjoyable!

I love theis game so much.It helps me understand what the real world is like and helps me play the real board game I definitely rate it 5/5 heck 100,000/ 100,000 if I could I don't normally rate games 5/5 but this game definitely deserves the rating
Wating time of roll regeneration is to many. If you want to play without paying money, you can just play 5 or 10 minutes in day.

Is a good game but I really really really hate pop ups. Like every time you open the app you get the exact same 10 pop ups for purchases like really why. And when you run out of rolls it gives you those dam pop ups again
A good time waster game. Gets repetitve after a while and the tsunami of popups they fling at you is insane. Graphics and artistic direction look fantastic

Fun, nostalgic and a little bit social. I think if it can be more social it would be more fun. If you can see how your friends is doing and give and request more from closest friends and check out people and make new friends. Would be nice.
Love it! Extremely good fun! I got rid of some other games after I found this one. I won't play any other ones, oh, maybe 1-5 other ones. 🎂

It's a blatant money grab. You can play for about 5 minutes before you run out of "dice" to roll and then you are immediately promoted with 3 adds to spend money. Not worth it, can't do anything unless you spend money

Absolute 5 star so intriguing just love it and the good thing about it is that you have breaks it isnt an everlasting game because when you're out of money and out of dice you cannot do anything the only thing that would bring the last star down to a half mark is that it needs internet to play. But brilliant game everyone NEEDS TO DOWNLOAD IT, IT IS A BLOODY FANTASTIC GAME COULDNT LOVE ANYTHING ELSE MORE

After reading all the bad reviews I deleted the app immediately. I would much prefer to pay upfront or annually for a game than to constantly be pushed or hassled for more and more payments. Sounds like gambling without any chance of winning.

There are too many annoying popups for spending money in the game. And they pop up every 10 seconds which makes the game nearly unenjoyable. The buy options are already permanently displayed on the side why do they have to be pushed in my face constantly too???

I thought I downloaded a monopoly game that I can play just like monopoly with friends or random players, instead we got just kind of auto play bs with monopoly brand on it. Ridiculous amount of pop ups to make players spend money and extremely fast pay wall within 30 minutes of playing. Crazy disappointed
It's cool. Pretty flashy, relatively quick load. Not gonna make you an amazing person or anything, but, fun.
Nice take on an old classic. I like how I can tear down others monopolies it's fun so far. I've been playing for 8 hours now
It's like pirate island and boaring. I hate how u have to click collect all the time, ofc we collect OMB just make it collect automatically uggh. Delays the game!
Pretty much like coin master and all the other games, but I must say its more interesting that this version is a monopoly version which I think is pretty cool
I enjoyed it so much my girls started playing it too , its become our family game i recommend ot you just have sometime to kill it is an enjoyable game if you loke the original you'll love it.
Really boring game. Has nothing to do with Monopoly at all. It's Monopoly themed. Gets really repetitive quick.
I give it a five star rating because it is a great family game. Even for family that is far away. What a great way to keep in contact an have fun.
Fun but...too many pop ups for pay to play. It's nothing like regular Monopoly, but still fun to play.
I wish there was more ways to get moves(dice) instead of having to purchase them. You have to wait a long time before you have some.
Okay, nice graphics, interface decent, repetitive 6 out of 10, strategic elements seem minimal

It's easy and fun to play with your friends I got all my friends and most of my family to start playing this game , it's a lot of fun and the stickers you win you can share with your friends to help them too.
Not the monopoly game u used to play. In the end, you're gonna play a destructive card collecting kind of game. Same ol same ol. Boring
Fun. Addicting. Regular Monopoly with a twist. Wish you had more tokens though or able to play with your friends more.
Super fun and cam play with friends I haven't spoken to in a while. All it needs is being able to message friends in game
I really love it it's like the actual game just in solo match but I hope that there is an update feature where you can play with friends that would be fun .
Love this game. It's exciting yet relaxing, the perfect combo for an addictive way to pass the time!
Love the Animations. Fun for the family. Wish I could compete with persons one on one tho. Keep it up!
Fun game! But many cons...and issues that y'all need to fix...like the friend invites who don't register to get the prizes
The game is fun to play & pass the time but the almost constant pop ups asking you to spend money really kill the fun.
It's is very fun I enjoy playing as well as the board game I like the animation and design of the game.

The game is nice I personally enjoyed playing it, very casual and relaxing, the only annoying thing is when I try to switch opponents during shut down it lags and does not prodeed to my chosen opponent's board so i have to restart the game until I can finally play it again. Also I wish we can see the previous boards that we've already completed on the map. *Edit: What I meant about the previous boards is I wish we can see the landscapes that we've built not just the places we've completed
column11: Hi Camila! We are happy to hear you are enjoying the game. You may check your previous boards by tapping the Menu > Maps. If you need help with technical issues, feel free to write us a ticket in-game and we'd be glad to assist you!

column9: Previously I bashed thos game badly and gave it 2 stars cuz it's kinda money sucker. Actually it is not, I got so much bonuses and progress in just one day and i enjoy it
Board kings rip off. Super boring. I spent a few bucks to keep playing and this game has zero replay value.
Great game really being able to play with friends love it. Best hands down. I would definitely give it mobile game of the year.

Love the game but it won't sign-in with google play. When I hit the button it doesn't do anything, please fix. I don't have facebook to connect it and I will lose what I have played if I reset or change my phone.
Gameplay is fine, basically gambling. Problem is unlimited pop ups trying to get you to spend spend spend $$$.

Wonderful! I have played this game over 40 years. This is not strictly the table-top version. That is not a bad thing however. Nice brainless fun set in Monopoly universe. Just enough added to keep interesting.
The game is very fun but one thing about the shield they should add when a shield break a shield that you collected will go back to replace it
Please make new mini games. Incorporate some more classic monopoly themes. And only 50 roll for reaching level 40? Do better!!!!! 2 months worth of app
So much fun and way quicker than the actual monopoly! Also so up to date with everything! I totally recommend this game!
Love this game. When you connect with Facebook and all your friends start playing, it can get very competitive.
I've played monopoly for years. Now that it's on my phone I can play my favorite board game here on my phone. Thanks for the memories and a way to play my favorite board game.
Went from 1 to 5 because I played it on just play app and it payed my my first rewards but when I got to my second it didn't. Of course that was a more opstantial one. Scam
brilliant game, the only issue I have is that it takes far too long to get full spins, I was playing at 12.30 am n at 8.50am I still hadn't got full spins!
Please fix this: Very often freeze when roll double to escape from jail, never happened on my ipad ios. Thanks
Addicted already....only complaint would be the game freezes a little every now and then. Other than that I love it!
Really fun game. Love bank heist. Super fun!!! I love to steal my friends money. See you up high on the leaderboards! I love to play this while watching TV. Very casual but fun at the same time.
It's not like the game where everyone gets together and each one buys, and whoever has the most wins. It is a single player game. it's kinda bored
It's cool for an app. The stamp collection is annoying serves no purpose. But other than that I guess it passes time
This game is FANTASTIC!! The animations are fun to see and the gameplay is easy. GREAT GAME 🎮!
So far so good it keeps your mind active and a good game to just turn off after a while but makes you want to play more. I'd recommend to others.
I love Monopoly, but I don't like that you don't buy your property on here. They just randomly give it to you. Otherwise it's simple to play.

This is a privacy query for the developers. The app seems to be storing and utilizing our facebook profile picture and storing it for the bots to use. There is no chance to change your profile picture once they have attached your current facebook profile for them to use. It is not linked to your facebook profile. Even if you change your profile picture in your connected account, the old picture is still attached. Can you please give some clarification or solution regarding this?

Been playing since last year, At first It was fun and enjoyable, It was nostalgic, like I'm back in my childhood days but after the recent update this month, a lots of bug and error occurred in the game most especially in the event. Honestly I'm sad giving you a 1star rating but if ever in the future you fix all the problems in the game, I will change my rating and maybe give you a 5 stars.
The game was fun to play for a while, but it was beginning to feel boring. And after only a week of playing, the game glitched out on me as well, I can't do anything.
I love it! Who doesn't like Destroying stuffs and making new friends at the same time. So far not one glitch in this game.
Great Game! Fun and easy to play, it's like a cross between the Monopoly you love and Dice Dreams.
I've only gotten to the 2nd board and yet I'm having a lot of fun the game looks and runs very well and I love it so far :)
Pretty cool game .....BUT takes way too long to generate dice for moves unless you wanna spend a small fortune....fix that and definately a 5* rating from me
Brings back memories of taking money and building an empire. Pretty simple to play and great boards.
Never seen a game where board progress constantly goes down and unless you pay for dice etc you have no chance to regain that progress, absolute joke... it can hardly be called a game either.
Extremely fun and rewarding game! Time consumption is high due to its addictive nature.
Great game wish you didn't have to connect to FB because not everyone has a FB account. Should of went with Playstore instead.

Could not play screen remained black. left on for several minutes, didn't work. do not use
column11: Hi! We are sorry you are experiencing some visual issues. We are working to fix any issue and we are always available to help you improve your gaming experience. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you!

column9: I like this monopoly Go... I have ppl who plays with me and I love destroying buildings 👷🏾‍♂️ and getting money 💰 🤑and i like it.....its different from the norm.
This GAME IS A MUST TRY!! the graphics are visually appealing to the eyes. There is so much to do in the game will not get bored.

Games ok cross between board King's and card master. Shame to say about the tournaments came 10th place didn't even get my winnings.. safe to say thats just ruined it for me. felt like I just wasted my time..
It's a great game lots of challenges and fun the only thing is would like to get dice quicker or more than 5 every hour
This game is so fun I just don't get it when u land on PASS GO AND COLLECT $200 when in the real game u actually have to pass it.
Really fun and relaxing to play. No ads, only if you want to watch video to get free stuff.
I love the play style it isn't too hard and I can add friends but I wish there was a free spin every day or every 5 hrs that will be great
No communication from support team it's like you don't actually matter so thanks for the help 1 star till you bother to help with why my friends wasn't added to the total bar

Pretty Great! It's Monopoly with a bang, literally. You can knock over other people's buildings. You go around the board making money to build your cities. Famous cities. Like New York, USA & Paris, France. Invite your friends from Facebook ^_^
Game has nice graphics and all but you have no control, you just press a button and watch stuff happen on screen, makes it seem kind of pointless to me.
Amazing! Really fun and competitive app. One thing I would change, is the time you have to wait for dice tools. An hour for five rolls, just to use them in 30 seconds.

Not enough dice given to actually progress in game. Saying goodbye for now. Will check back later to see if you all make it easier to get dice. I love these types of games but with no progression makes it boring.

Too many pop ups. Yes, I know I don't have any more rolls and no I won't be spending money for 10 rolls. Avoid this, enjoyable only for the first 20 minutes when you're advancing the boards and getting some rolls.

Decent game but clearly made to cash grab. When you start you get hundreds of rolls but this quickly boils down into waiting for more or buying some. Lots of pop ups asking for your money. Wish I could rate higher as graphics and feel is nice

I love the game but I wish that there were not so many popups one right behind the other and there seems to be something missing like when we finish a board all of are house and things vanish it seem like you don't have anything accomplished at the end just my opinion

I've restarted my phone, uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Rest my network settings. Still same thing. I just got 5 of my friends to join and play and now I can't even play? Please fix this and I'll change to 5 stars.

column9: Edited review. I am moving to 2 stars. I stopped playing because of ads. I get it. Money, profit...but come on. Very very intrusive.

Another bad coin master type but with this one you can loose all the money you've built up to buy buildings to progress because someone stole it all while you waited an hour for 5 more rolls. Avoid this money grabbing game if you like having your money

column9: Looked forward to a fun Monopoly style game. This is just another money grab built by greedy devs. Not sure how this game has a high rating based on the amount of low reviews. Somethings fishy, so dont get caught up in their hook.
It has a repetitive game feeling. It doesn't feel like a real Monopoly game. But still it doesn't feature ads and has a premium game feeling.

Extreme pay to win with no actual challenge or tasks. You just roll dice, there's nothing else to do... Not sure how this is considered a game as all the strategy of real monopoly has been removed. Really disappointed

Decent game, but I might be deleting this soon because its taking photos from my gallery and photos that I haven't shared with anyone pictures that I've drawn and whenever I knocked down a building, it shows one of my pictures in that circle and I haven't put any of those pictures on social media or anything

The gameplay loop is fine, but the popups, constant bank robberies taking you back down to zero before you get a chance to build out a building, and PAINFULLY slow roll generation, this was an uninstall.
I do like this game. My favourite part is actually knocking down the buildings. Hehe. I like that I can progress fast....when I have dice. However I hate that I only get 5 dice rolls per hour.
It's hugely annoying when every time you go back on to the game or every time you run out of rolls, about 3-4 pop-ups appear trying to make you spend money on the game 🙄

My son wanted me to download this so that we could play together and for him to get more rolls. Now I'm hooked. 😍 It's so cute and fun to play. 💕 I love the original Monopoly concept with the modern mix. 5 stars! 🌟

Fun game. Would like to have more things to do when landing on properties. What isn't so fun is that it feels like I am playing by myself on the board. I also would like to be able to change my board piece.
Would recommend, but don't buy anything on the app it's no point, just wait for the dice to reload. Having fun on this game, would highly recommend to keep your self busy.

It's like board kings and monopoly had a baby that was loved to the point of smothering, my only issue is that the dice don't regenerate as quickly, with 5 dice an HOUR, if it was shorten to ten minutes I would think that would be pretty good, increasing play time
Having a blast of a time only thing is need more dices to be added to the game like putting them on the board so we can land on them

this game is actually a torjon virus that makes your phone not able to access at all (s in lock screen also cannot access!) guys do not download this game!!!! it is just a virus who named by famous monopoly brand!! please get this game shutdown before it destroy more gadget and lets make a green gaming environment for the future safety!

Monopoly Go is one of the best games I have ever played on mobile. So far there are no ads which I'm pretty happy about But the only thing is it's not the classic/original one. I would recommend playing it though!

Giving 3 stars due to the amount of pop ups, and the struggle to getting rolls and money to upgrade.... Other than those 3 things it's awesome and I love it. Been on everyday since I downloaded it

Not enough rolls, people constantly attacking 😒 it's just like coin master and tbh there's to many P2W people on the game that constantly attack your islands and buildings its unfair 😤 so unfortunately the game has been unistalled you just can't win and constantly have to fix buildings due to attacks every 1hr!

LOVE this game. Very thrown off by the negative reviews I saw before downloading, this is one of the most delightful and whimsical apps in this godforsaken land of sketchy google play games. Wish I could get my friends to play! I mean I dont actually have friends but still.
Completely lakcing any sort of meaningful content. Simply no reason to play. No incentive to accumulate money, it all goes back to zero next board.
This version of Monopoly is kinda cool to be honest. Even kids will be able to get it. Plus it can have a cool down period when you run out of rolls.

In the invite friends to get reward i added 6 people but only 3 out of 10 bar added i think there is a bug please fix it. My bar should supposed to be 6/10 now but it isn't. I tried redownloading the game still not 6/10

I know it's a new game but it takes forever to get new dice I mean 5 dice every hour people are going to lose interest there's got to be a way to earn more dice 🎲 I really love the game but I can only place it once a day because it takes to long

Basically board kings, but with less cute bunnies and no real time to monopoly apart from the graphics. I didn't even get to pick an icon to play as.

2 minutes of game play, twice a day, unless you make in-app purchases. Hasbro going from one of the longest boardgames to shortest app games. Congratulations on your expert knowledge of the market and what people want from a mobile game...

Fun pass time don't rush to spend money tho there are over 100 maps gets a bit repeatative and encourages you to spend more to catch up. Too many pay2win pushes.

It's so fun how you just can go around the Monopoly board or money go to other people's stores and destroy stuff to get money you can do bank robberies so fun and also the collector stickers it's really cool to collect those I recommend and no adds

column9: Uninstall, Five Or six ad cards every few moments. Far too greedy with their time gating. All in all could have been a great game if not ruined by greed. Yall can make plenty of money without being greedy.

column9: Nothing like actual Monopoly, it's just the theme. There's very little to do except wait for more rolls and even then rolling isn't fun.
Decent game, good for time wasting. Very pushy with microtransactions but most games have to be now if you dont buy it. Will continue to play.
The mix of Monopoly and Coin Master into one game and you've got Monopoly GO - I don't play these games at all, but this game is the best I've played and it's so much fun!

column9: A whole new aspect of playing Monopoly... It reminds me of a game called dice for dreams or something like that. It is definitely a well-built platform
Very bad experience so many people attacking you and robing you. And the must funny thing is that you extremely never get a shield when you need it. Oh and the most important thing p2w
Too many pop-ups trying to make me buy something. If I use all my dice, or if I only have 2 dice left (not enough for 3x rolls) I also get 3 pop-up windows.

Takes to long for dice 🎲 to refill.Am on level 200 only.i get 40 max refill.The prices on property's are too high for only 40 refills.not going to progress much further.Yes you can buy with real money.but them deals are very poor.

Graphics and all are great, but waiting an hr per 5 rolls or being forced to buy more to play longer, deal breaker. Understand the concept but not gonna drain my pockets to pad your dreams 3dollars per 95 rolls or having to wait to only play when the rolls are full.
Everything works fine, the interface was good BUT THIS IS NOT A CLASSIC MONOPOLY THAT WHAT I THINK AND WANT. Other than that i would rate this game fairly good.
No worthwhile progress. Just a dice roller and nothing like actual monopoly besides the scenes. Just feels dead and the is no competition or strategy.

Really fun but Need a way to buy rolls with in-game money or play minigames to earn. Gets boring waiting 8 hours to receive 30-40 rolls. But kudos to the developers! Wanted monopoly on my phone for agesss
What is the point? Like what is the actual point of the game mindlessly clicking round and round the board it's nothing like monopoly no strategy or skill required.
Esperance of a life time!! Absolutely love it getting me through covid for the 3rd time in 3 months lol 😆 only thing 5 roles every hour for free isn't enough. Overall brilliant game
The game is pretty lame, you don't make that much money and upgrading anything is super expensive. The original version of the game is much more fun then this
I've always loved Monopoly. Although it's more fun to me as the original board game playing with family and friends around a table. This app is definitely a close second.

Why do you game companies always want us to link our Facebook account? I don't want all of these posts constantly being posted to my Facebook account with my game progress. I also don't want the gaming company having access to the info on my Facebook. Why don't you allow us to connect via our Google account? I have a Google account specifically made for my gaming stuff. And all of my friends connect with that. I'm uninstalling the game and I haven't even started it all because of this!!!!
column11: Hi there! We would like to confirm that aside from Facebook, once you logged in to the game using a Guest account, you can also link/save your progress via Google Play through the in-game settings. Hope this helps.

column9: It's a cute game that's okay I mean I seen better but it's not bad. Wish you could be on teams it would be so much. Or go against somebody. That would be fun
VERY cool! A seriously fun twist to an already historic and multifaceted game! Lots and lots of fun. Is there something available that explains the game?

It's fun good concept as smartphone adaptation of monopoly they really tried hard and thought out well. Fun board game and destroying & Looting other players works like charm.
This game is actually pretty good if you feel a bit stressed and then go because it is so simple. Would recommend and reminds me of coin master.
Great repetitive game, but can't control the. Music or sound. Very annoying.
Terrible, no skill required just one button press. Annoying pop ups begging you to make purchases every 15 seconds.
Not too bad. Game gets repetitive after a while. But not many ads or micros,yet.

This is a game like the board game it is fun but this game is more exciting because you can build your city and create cities and earn dice and money by rolling the dice and taking a chance it's like the game spin a spell except its a board game

Well if you're bored of playing on your tablet phone one? Of those when all? Of the games that are just for yourself and really? Want. To? Play. With somebody else to compete this? Is it in 90% of stuff? Is free to play next thing to say have . God bless
Not the monopoly game you're used to, like the twist in it pretty fun so far. Just wish it didn't take so long for your dices to refresh.
1 hour for 5 turns!!!!!! I think the wait time to get turns back is sooooo long just for 5 turns. I feel like it should be 15min for every 5 turns.

Great, but I want to be able to play against my friends on the board without Facebook because I'm a child. I don't use Facebook but I want to play with my friends on the board( and when I say PLAY I don't mean ATTACK OR STEAL OK )

A great roll the dice game. It's an easy click and play game. Not many ads and great graphics.
Been looking for a monopoly like game for a while. And this is like a monopoly and dice dreams crossover. I love it!
Okay this is a really good game but the pop ups are crazy they need to stop also I wish they could add clans or see your friends places and have like leaderboards like a ranking system to earn stuff

column9: Good and fun game to play with friends, lots of events. Only big down side is: the regeneration rate of new rolls is 60 minutes which is super long. Maybe shorten it to 30 minutes and I'd give it 5.

column9: Fake advertising, riding the wave of people wanting good ol' monopoly which Hasbro gatekeeps for whatever reason. Disgusting mobile pay to compleat. Do you have about 500-1200$? Well, congrats, you finished the game. That's the price to reach the end. Or you can spend smaller amounts which give you smallest of boosts.
Quick, easy & Simple "Game" is, Simple in design, not a lot of Actually playing although only played for like 20 minutes. It's good to waste time with.

A little more fun than I thought it would be. I like we're traveling the world... I hate you have to have facebook to change your player id. Wish you would let us use Google and pick out our own identities.

This is a really fun game I would definitely tell other people about it it's really. fun and I definitely enjoy playing it of course I just love monopoly so it's good to play monopoly but I'll have to buy the Mobile game.

All they did was Steal the Idea from Board Kings+Coin Master (which you can download and play on here) and gave it a monopoly theme, hoping you wouldn't notice. Nothing original about this game, you go around the board attacking players for their funds (Board Kings) and wrecking their city to steal their income as your own (Coin Master). Disappointed, here I thought you guys were going to be original but instead you just copy and paste.
