column11: Hi Mel! It’s always a pleasure to hear that our effort has created a satisfying experience for a Monopoly enthusiast. We are really happy to hear that you enjoy the game!

column9: Easy to follow instructions. Great graphics and just as much fun as the board game.
It's fun. It moves fast and lots of different things going on. Best Monopoly sense the first time i played. Enjoy i did so i have it 5 stars
I've had no pop ups at all only thing that's is frustrating is you have to wait 5hours for 5 dice at least make it 10 a hour. But other then that good game.
My experience has been good. No megative ads popping up frequently. Kinda reminds me of coin master tho lol
Just some light hearted fun. Not much to the game and very repetitive, but sometimes it's nice to play a game you don't have to concentrate on lol
I like the game but the problem is that whenever I landed on the jail tha game always freeze. It happens all the time
Looks like monopoly, feels like monopoly, but it's just a twisted version that's NOT MONOPOLY, and ads pop up constantly to buy overpriced dice, maybe fun for someone else but i uninstall
Mindless, not much strategy.. but still fun & unique! Captures a competitive spirit of battling others through silly money earning games
Game concept similar to coin masters, only this is a much more enjoyable game as your playing Monopoly to get your money instead of spinning a wheel.
I love that you can add friends and rob your friends and attack their areas. It's interactive and the graphics are great
Do you hate playing games? Would you rather watch a game play itself while pop-ups and notifications spam you to make in-game purchases? Then this is the "game" for you.
It is a boring game that is just a rip off of other games. This has nothing to do with monopoly besides the board. Very disappointing.
It's fun. but i wish it's the classic Monopoly where i can play with my friend real time.

Not as expected, I was wanting a Pokemon go styled monopoly game like atlas earth or something instead got a Stupid game like coin master, and it's not even monopoly it's just probably a temp in a game making engine or something like that im thoroughly disappointed
Fun game. Enjoyable waste of time. It's similar to others out there but with its own little mini twists.
It's fun But it would be better if it had more mini games .. like more stuff to do .. Gets boring once in while just clicking the dice button 😴

Addicive, great graphics, great game overall. DOWNLOAD IT. (:uggh compared 2 Street fighter , this is an original made just as good if not better). Great work guys. I literally only started 20min ago n I'm Lovin'it 💯💪💪🏽
Good game if you really like monopoly. You can build things in different places like New York City to London all the way to Venice!
I love this game addicting and so fun great job its been awhile since i found a game worthwhile love the quickness and how i can pick up and go and still be the same game later on .
Very addictive and fun game I'm giving it 4/5 only because the game makes you want to buy a lot of micro transactions to keep playing and rolling the dice 🤣
Addictive and easy to play. Always new challenges. Very fun
It's fun, love the concept of the game still like old just building the areas we need. Kinda like piggy go but better.

I wouldn't say it's a bad game but nothing can beat the original game play or the board game version but this game is very fun I like the concept of being able to destroy other people's landmarks after using the huge amount of money but it's okay in my book
the game often lags while in prison, to get the dice it takes a long time, always get the same sticker and the price for the dice is very expensive. Not happy after in level 800.

It is a great game but it always targets you about 4 times to pay for things like more rolls and more money every time you go into the app and there are more targets throughout the game. But other than that it is a good game.

Day 1 of playing, this game is similar to Board Kings: Dice Online Game; where you roll dices, improve your board, heist other players and destroy other players buildings. This game is great if you got friends to play with but for me a Solo player not so much. There's no force ads and has good graphic, that's all about I can about game. If you like this game then good for you but for me it's a skip. I can't write my reasons because of the 500 words limit.

*How many pop-ups, is enough.* I personally think you should add more, 3 isn't enough, your game is still enjoyable. You guys should ask me if I need more dice throws when I have half of my maximum amount left.

It's a chill game made for people who don't want to think much while playing but the game uses those users to milk money by showing constant in app purchases. And also the there are about 15 cards totally rare can't get them that easy can't even trade.
The game itself is good but at the start of level 7, it freezes on me and I lose my entry fee. Fix this issue immediately

WASTE OF TIME. No matter how much you participate in tournaments, you will never get the cards u need unless you have luck. Have been waiting for 2 weeks to get the only card I need to complete this season but I keep receiving dupes. Can't even trade gold cards and has always bugs. Not worth it.

Worst game. Get about 5 mins enjoyment before you have to wait for hours to get more rolls (or casually just spend $8 for more rolls and another 5 mins of fun) and the pop ups during gameplay are enough to send anyone Insane.
I love this game! Having so much fun, granted I haven't been playing for long probably going to get stupid hard and be pay to win, but I'm enjoying a lot foe now it's fast pace and easy to learn.
I like the game, I feel shouldn't have to wait so long for rolls Coming back to my properties being destroyed even though I have shields?! Please fix or I will be deleting
column11: Hi! We are sorry you are having some issues with your Shields. We are working to fix any issue and we are always available to help you improve your gaming experience. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you!

column9: Good game to pass time couple times daily but the devs should be ashamed of themselves forcingg that many adds on you for purchases, even the offers they show your arent worth it like €11.99 for 100 spins is outragous. If the adds calm fown ill change rating
Fun game but a total cash grab. The price of more rolls is way too high given how much you need to progress and getting them for free takes all day.
This game is awesome. You don't have to struggle to earn money though waiting for the dices to reload takes time but overall, i love this game.
Such a fun game.. bit hard to complete sets though, seems forever to wait for 5 dices.. need to have free daily bonuses on Facebook page would be ideal
Definitely a fun game to play, the downside is waiting so long for more rolls but other then that it's a fantastic game.
Good addictive game, but really does need tweaking. 5 dice per hour means actually playing more than once a day isnt really an option.
VERY NICE graphic. There is no strategy what so ever needed in this game. Just a time killer game.
There's no gameplay. You can mindlessly push a button and that's it. Not worth to spend a minute on it
It's really fun me and my friends play it a lot. The only thing is when you run out of rolls it takes a hour to get 5 but other than that i love it
Just started playing. Great time waster and love the animation. I enjoy Monopoly and their game is a good rendition.
Boring & Uninspired Cashgrab with no really fun mechanics. Just autorolling dice and dumb destruction and heist mini game. That's it, nothing to see, just go play actual monopoly
I love this game.. monopoly will always be a classic.. and I'm here for this.. plus it's so easy to keep winning dice and money..
Traditional map, I like it, is fun but it has one problem, when I run out of ROLLS there's like 5+ add that pop out about buying more ROLLS...
It is so fun. When i play, i end up palying for hours without leaving the game. I recomennd to play thos on road trips or something long because this is the best game ive played!
This is absolutely amazing I love it and I even learned how to play on the real monopoly board and now I have 6-7 monopoly boards because this game is amazing
Of all the dice games that allow you to build this one is probably one of the better ones. Colorful, easy to play, simple

Boaring starts of great with challenges then stops so you'll buy dices and there not cheap this game just wants you to spend don't download The board is rigged come on there's being greedy but this game wants cash how about ypu developers give a little I've had a week's worth of real sucky boards

I enjoy the idea of the game and I like the artistic style, however there's things that make this game unenjoyable. It's extremely difficult to progress in this game in any meaningful way without spending real money. Yes there's a few free gifts, but they aren't enough to really progress. There are also challenges / competitions / milestones, but they are difficult to achieve because you need money to get a good amount of rolls, with more rolls you can do x10 or x20 and finally progress in game
Mediocre. No real gameplay, just continuous tapping until you run out of rolls, then it offers you to buy more
There is a problem that the button to connect your Google Play Games account does not work, so if you do not use Facebook as is my case, you have to play as a guest
Having a good time playing against my friends. It's a rather enjoyable game. A new spin on an old classic. Thank you Monopoly Go!!!
VERY FUN GAME!!!! Me and my family have been recently competiting to see who can get the highest net worth and it's very fun. Would recommend 10/10!
This game would be sooo much better without the aggressive ad pushes or the slow dice recovery, just fix that and I'll give it 5 stars
Why is it stuck in loading 33 percent of the game? At first, it's okay then this happened. It hung on loading. Please fix issue.
column11: Hello! We are sorry to hear about your gaming experience. This was an issue affecting many players and our game team already managed to resolve.

column9: I like the fast paste this game brings to the table since original monopoly usually takes forever. Another easy quick fun game to enjoy.
It feels liks its missing something, but then again I'm very low level I think. It does a nice job at passing time
It is a lot of fun alot of various aspects I like not alot of dislikes and you can play the game with out spending a dime is my favorite part
Love the game. It reminds me of the monopoly board I used to play with family. Quick in earnings and building estates.
really really REALLY fun, and quite addicting. i love the steal feature when you land on the rail roads, sooo fun.
It's very good still think 5 spins you get should be every half hour not every hour maybe add few tournaments with mini board or different way to win spins

Nothing like monopoly other than the board u jump around on. Also the word Go had me excited it would be something like Pokémon go but monopoly. Kind of deceiving. I don't see why they even named it that. 😒 uninstalling today....
Not fun at all, very repetitive. Like all Scopely games must spend a lot of money to accomplish anything.
I like the game but when you run out off turns with the dice you got to wait about an hour before you can play again

Really dull. You just keep clicking until you run out of rolls but essentially it's just an idle clicker game. Click. Get some cash. Upgrade buildings that do nothing. When all upgraded move on to another level. Yawn. Occasionally try to break someone's buildings but 80% of the time they have a shield. Sometimes u click on boxes to match 3 items but just get some cash. No skill required. This is nothing like monopoly (u decide if that's good or not) but that is literally it. Don't bother.
Everybody likes monopoly, but it's not always easy to play. But this game makes it easier to play the game. Really love how they made the game
Boring repetitive and filled to the brim with pop-ups that try to make you spend money. Feels like a cash grab with no effort put into it.
Great game very addictive.. whould be better if I didn't have to wait so long for rolls .. its definitely pay to win without a doubt
For a start, I can say I love it. I hope it will not become like Coin Master while we progress to the game.
I wish you could play without needing to spend money for dice rolls. And other stuff. Beside that the game is great.
Really enjoying the game. Similar to board kings if you are familiar with it, but better in my opinion! Good job
Very fun to play! Slight lag when roll a dice but fine with that! Playing with friends is very fun!

1 hour to get 5 rolls or spend £5 for 100 rolls bit of a rip off, would be a good game if it was better balanced, but to wait 1 hour for less than a minute of gameplay is poor, think I'm done after an hour of gameplay, fun while it lasted
Lots of pop to the graphics. Moving along and good cross between monopoly and the spinning raiding revenging games.
It's a decent game but I have to give it 3 stars mostly because it's similar to "Coin Master". The graphics are good, it runs well.

I love Monopoly, playing it for years but this game has nothing to do with the original board game. Its just throwing dice until you're out. Then you can pay from 3,49 up to 119,99 to get some extra dice. I understand developing costs money, I really do, but this is insane. Would have loved to pay for the original Monopoly, just like on the Nintendo Wii. This game is just not that. Not for me.. sorry..
I am at a point of the game where I play all the rolls in 4mins. There is not a vibe of Monopoly here, just a routine. Nothing new.

I just opened the app and a pop up said that there's a new album collection to collect be everytime i click collect the error says that the game needs to restart. And it did. But whenever i click the pop again the error appears again. Were going in circles and i can't play. Please fix this.
column11: Hi Athina! Thanks for playing Monopoly Go! Our team is aware of stability issues and is continuously working on a fix. We also suggest you try updating the game to its latest version. If you need help with something else, don't hesitate to contact our customer support team. Thanks!

column9: I really appreciated this game for months that I played this daily, but I have a problem of the 4 train station might confusing whenever you're going to "Shut Down" or "Heist" some players. And also I can't get land on train station because my dice is always run out of time, it's just embarrassing to me. I hope in the future, they're is a new feature sign whenever you land on train if it is "Shut Down" or "Heist".
column11: Hi Nico! We are very glad to hear that you are enjoying the game for months now and thank you so much for taking the time to share your ideas regarding the Railroad Tiles! We'll make sure to share your thoughts with the team for further consideration. We wish you the best and stay tuned for more exciting stuff!

column9: 4 stars for now. I hope there is an improvment on how you will accept the friends. Like if you can add an option Accept All button instead of adding the friends one by one which takes a lot of time and app gets laggy when adding them simultaeneously.
column11: Hi Frelyn! Your feedback is important to us and we want to thank you for playing Monopoly Go! We'll share your thoughts with our team for future consideration! If you need help with anything, feel free to write us a ticket in-game and we'd be glad to assist you!

column9: Very good game just please make it so after every hour, you receive your amount of rolls not 5 rolls per hour. My only con about the game. 👍
It just feels like I'm playing with algorithms and spread sheets designed to make money. I just don't feel any heart in the game
LOVE IT it gives me a game to play when i am nored and i love how you can own different citys at first i thought it was just a boring monopoly game nut i was wrong
I love Monopoly, from back in the day until now. I still love playing the board game with my kids!!
Great game so far however it could use more mini games at times it seems repetitive maybe another action when landing on free Parking?
there's a glitch when you upgrade a landmark and it gives you a house but your house total doesn't go up and it doesn't place one on the board
I love coin master and this game is pretty much the same as cm . So if u enjoy cm or games of that kind try it out . Im sure youll agree
Honestly way too fun for its own good. Never thought they could reinvent Monopoly into its own spin off game but they really did!

Takes way to long till you get to play again without paying for extra things which I always believe is never necessary, fully understand that they are cash grabbing and kids will fall trap to it but cmon they could do better
So far so good! No ads getting in the way. So far have had a bunch of rolls and money and it's fun playing with Facebook friends
Awesome game but keeps making error to restart. It is still restarting because of the money heist crashing due to some error
column11: Hi! We are sorry you are experiencing crashes. We are working to fix any issue and we are always available to help you improve your gaming experience. Please contact our support team at monopoly-go-support@scopely.com so that we can better assist you.

column9: Missed out on 500 spins because the events didn't have timers below them on the main screen. Customer services didn't help.
Boring and filled with ads and shopping. You just roll every 10hrs and click. No choices or thinking. Good for potatoes
Just another rehash of Dice Dreams, which is basically Coin Master.... has absolutely NOTHING to do with the excellent card game, Monopoly Go. Don't bother with this app...

I'm so happy I found this game. The only thing questionable to me is community chest part. Should be able to add other players, not just new. I don't know enough people who play games like I do in person. Other than that, I love this game!
So far i like it. It's a board dice game with battle mini games. I wish I could get more rolls like on a spin daily sort of thing
Cool little game. It's fun. No ads. And they give you lots of rolls before you run out.
I love this game, BUT its really anoying when it asks you 24/7 if you want to buy something like more rolls or more money. Other than that its pretty fun
Just started recently playing it, having seen it advertised all over place, and I'm finding myself liking it so far, being a fun dice game.
Very fun. The game play is nice and doesn't seem completely predetermined. There are a fair amount of paid adds
This is a new twist to games like coin master and mafia master. But it's more fun. I love it!
I've invited several people but never got rewards, don't waste your time trying to invite your friends to play and expect to get rewards, doesn't work
Awesome little game if you love monopoly like I do bring me back to my younger days of the 80s . Nice one friends for passing it on and monopoly for making it happen . Thank you 🙏
column11: Hi there! It’s always a pleasure to hear that our effort has created a satisfying experience for a Monopoly enthusiast. We are really happy to hear that you enjoy the game!

column9: So far so good. I finally bent to the pressure of seeing ad all time. It seems fun so far.
I like the gameplay so far but the community chest feature is a real turn off. How can I open a chest that needs 5 friends if I have 0 that play the game.
I love the app! I have never been so excited for years! I recommend this app to everyone, even if they don't like Monopoly. This is the greatest app of the decade!
Great game, the graphics are amazing, and the update of the game that I use to enjoy from a tabletop to virtually is outstanding
I'll be honest, this feels like Board Kings but with Monopoly skinned over it, not that it's bad, but Board Kings feels a bit more polished.

Alright time waster when you have dice rolls. Of course there's a ton of IAP to by more dice to keep rolling, and the refill is 5 per hour, not x per 5 or 10 mins, so you play your rolls and wait a few hours then repeat, or buy. Would be nice to turn off the prompts to buy after you're out of rolls, but such is the life of playing any android game now a days.
Fun addicting and a rather recommendable one Only gripes are It's not really responsive at points Can get slow A bit pay to win heavy.. but not as bad as others
Interesting take on monopoly I'm having a good time I'm just wondering if can actually complete the album without paying for more rolls. Lots of fun still
This game is soooooooooooo fun you can choose your character in the beginning you can also play with friends I recommend it
Amazing graphics, amazing design. I love playing monopoly. I mean who doesn't hahaha
Excellent game to kill time! Loved it. If they can add some more mini-games in-game, it would be more fun!
It so self premoting, where it pushes your to buy more rolls and such. It descusting and annonying if you just want play fpr free. For shame.
Its a brilliant game to play when you got bothing to do but the free parking is where o dont like it but everything else is fab keep it up and im teling ma friend about this if a see them:)
Lots of fun with a Monopoly theme. I do hope it gets more challenging as the game proceeds.
Love the game, They should have videos to watch for xtra dice when we run out. As well as daily collections thru fb.

Well this game is very fun so i would recommand playing it if u have good internet other than that it is great so for any one that likes dice rolling games or board games this is for u and who likes to smash other people boards it is awesome
it's very easy to begin with then it progress a little harder slowly keeping you very interested in the game I love this game.
It just has a black screen for like a hundred years so can you please fix it it is very bad I can't even play it
column11: Hi! We are sorry you are experiencing some visual issues. We are working to fix any issue and we are always available to help you improve your gaming experience. Please contact us in-game so that we can take a look at your account and help you!

column9: I LOVE Monopoly, but i am unable to start the app. please fix this, I'll put 3 stars just in case if you guys fix this.
Definitely not fun just push roll dice button. Nothing to do with Monopoly they really want your money every five seconds a fresh pop up.
Has a lot of real life cardboard game traits, but you don't have to wait on others to take their turn.
Wish there were more opportunities for free dice and you could invite people playing in the game to be your friend. Just started playing seems fun
I'm having a BLAST!! A lot of bonus rounds and cash gets collected quickly to build.
Kinda fun. Would like option of adding friends on game already playing, have no real life ones.

Been playing for a while now what annoys me is you cannot trade gold cards with others or trade cards for ones you need in general ... And getting dice 🎲 is crazy should have free dice to watch adds or something
Runs well, involves all your friends. Unwind yourself and find new ways to play along the way. It's actually worth it! Well done ✅
So far I like it very colorful I love the graphics reminds me of board games but 10× better. I wish you could play your Friends 1vs1
This game is similar to Coin Master, but in Monopoly format. It's actually more fun to play.
Love this game. Just think that is heavy on pushing you to buy exta coins and waiting 4 h for 5 spins is excessive but love the game and how it's got a fb page also
column11: Hi there! It’s always a pleasure to hear that our effort has created a satisfying experience for a Monopoly enthusiast. Reading your review, we understand that we still have hurdles to overcome which is something we are definitely aiming to resolve. Feel free to reach out and let us know of any additional changes you would like to see.

column9: This game is fun to play with friends and I highly recommend it. The game is simple, and if you login with Facebook you can mess with your friends!
Great little version of Monopoly. It's very adictive, cant stop playing any chance i get.

Waste of time with fake people accounts and fake generic "nice" and " beautiful" looking all smiling people photos which you supposedly playing against 🤣, pre-programmed dice rolls, paywall after a short stint...delete and forget about it...why did I even bother 😔
I thought they said it would be classic Monopoly! This is nothing like it! They said it was something else. The amount of pop-ups asking for money is absurd! Not good!
I use to play monopoly board game with my parents as a kid and after finding this app I think it puts a nice little spin on the original game of monopoly.
Great graphics fast easy gameplay I absolutely love all the interaction this game has to offer great job!
Only a couple minutes in but it's fun. A hint of the classic game but it is well polished and fun to play
Game is fun.. I played it as a child growing up and will continue to play here on the phone... Great job on the game
The ads seem fun but i cant seem to play it when i press guest it just goes to a black screen.Please try to fix it.
I know the game is free but I really don't like when the pop ups take up the entire screen and force you to stop playing and cancel them
Really enjoy the pace. It does throw real money purchases in your face a little often but other than that really good game.

I really love playing this Monopoly game it's been my favorite ever since I was a young child I do enjoy playing now that it's on the phone even more I have a lot more time to play it's a wonderful game and I can't wait to enjoy it more.
I was gonna rate 5 star but now it has me stuck in an error loop of loading, doing a shutdown and before the shutdown completes I get an error message making me start the cycle again
column11: Hello there! We are sorry to hear that you're having some issues loading the game as you are stuck in an error loop. Most performance-related issues can be resolved with some basic troubleshooting. If these steps didn't help, please contact our support team at monopoly-go-support@scopely.com so that we can better assist you.

column9: Can't add friends. I've invited my husband through Facebook, but we can't add each other to play.
It's fun! I love it just wish you didn't have to wait for your rolls re up to play because I'm not paying for more rolls.
Would like to have a more abundant access to dice at a lower fee. Game is fun to play.
It's good so far but I just hate that it takes forever to finish a board and to get more dice when you run out
It is very fun . Totally no advertisement at all unlike other apps. Get to play with friends as well
It is like tycoon or any other city building game, It's not like real Monopoly board game, and it is boring.
Um I just made a purchase but never got my purchase how can this be rectified ?? As I do really enjoy this game ND it wasn't a little purchase either ?????
Great game. However, having pop-ups shoved down my throat every 30 seconds isn't great.
It's a great game I love it but you really need to work on the cooldown time for the dice it's too long
It's fun, but only being on the 4th or 5th board prices are unbelievably high hope they go back down.
Super Fun, as I've always loved Monopoly. I absolutely love everything about this game.
Entertaining and being able to play on your own time without missing other players moves is a good touch
I live the game it's very intriguing being my first time playing monopoly, it keeps entertainined and busy.
Runs well and looks smooth but it's such a boring game. You literally run out of things to do after about 5 minutes.

Extremely disappointing how much of a money grab this game is. You receive a minimum of 2 "BUY DICE/PACKAGE" pop-ups when you enter the game and when you run out of dice (you have a max of 50-60 dice and they refill 5-6 every hour LOL!!). This game is a pathetic cash grab which does not take into consideration our enjoyment. Hasbro are so disgustingly greedy. Greedy, greedy, greedy.
Just a blatant, shameful cash grab. The sheer amount of popups asking you to spend money proves that Hasbro doesn't care about the classic Monopoly IP at all. Actually a revolting experience.

This game is fun I enjoy playing it I downloaded this game on just play app to earn money what real smooth play to get to game 5 got my rewards cat playing at the next reward was bored 11 now I am on board 12 and have not received my rewards
Fun game. Less pushy than the other coin master type games. Easy to earn enough cash to make progress so far.
It's so much fun. It's almost like it's just like the regular board game that you'd have at home, except better and portable
Addicted because I love gambling. After the third city it becomes very stale and boring. Gambling fun

This is not a game. There is no strategy or game play. It's simply rolling dice and going round the board to collect money to upgrade to be able to access the next level where it's the same thing. All while being bombarded with in app purchase requests. There is no trading no end point. You can literally set it to auto roll and if they allow the collect function to be auto there would be absolutely nothing for the user to do.
I honestly thought this game would be boring but I'm enjoying it, the only problem is there is a pop ups when you log in or run out of dice
Meh, at best. There is no real sense of achievement and the pop ups to spend money are waaaaaay to many.
Game seems ok, graphics cool, but the second you roll your last roll 785 windows pop up selling you more rolls.... guys its too much...dial it back a bit
Fun, different, move at your own pace. I'd say tried it cause of the things that make this game different than most in its category👍
column11: Hi there! We are happy to hear you are enjoying the game especially the different mechanics that we offer. Your feedback is important to us and we want to thank you for playing Monopoly Go!

column9: Nice game and graphics! My only problem is that the rolls generates slow.
Seriously fun!! Love the game play!! The graphics are great!! Going to hang on to this one for sure.
it's a simple but fun game. I absolutely love this game! no ads whats so ever :) my friends also love the game too
Fun time killer. Shame about not being able to watch adds to gain extra dice but good game.
Love the game! A fun twist on Monopoly. The animation is fun, stylish and very well done.
Cute Monopoly game. I enjoy the mini games. The rolls refill at a decent rate. Enjoying so far.
Pretty fun game. But the community chest requiring you to add friends is the most stupid idea I've seen if not of ur friends play the game.
A lot of fun. I enjoy monopoly alot. This game is simple and has fun visuals.
I saw this game in an ad and I downloaded it. Best. Idea. Ever. This game is so fun I play it for hours.
15 minutes of play before the pay2play wall starts making an appearance, overall boring monopoly with extra steps. Yawn.
This is really fun. It reminds me of Board Kings, which is very similar to this game, but this game is better. It's also easy to level up.
This monopoly game needs to have more adventures to it but I do love it the way it is!!!
I would give it 5 stars if you could customize the little characters that walk around the middle of the board
Simple fast and so far fun. It plays like a few other familiar games all wrapped up into one.
Really cute and fun! Love the design, colors and the mini games, although it's really easy to get money in the beginning. Wonder if it will get boring after a while, but so far really nice! :)
column11: Hi Greta! We are happy to hear you are enjoying the game. Your feedback is important to us and we want to thank you for playing Monopoly Go!

column9: Love it. Easy, casual playing. I just don't like not being to get certain things for lack of friends.
Nice little game! Only concern is that if this game is targeted to kids, you should change the statement that make steal something normal and acceptable.
I love the game! So fun And easy to play/use. 15/10 rating. 15 out of 10! i've not been playing for even 2 minutes and I'm up to London. Love the game.
Its very cute - I especially like the tiny people walking around the board but I don't like all the pop-ups every time I run out of dice
Interesting game, but the little people need to have a clapping sound added!!! So when they clap, we can hear them!
I think that this game is great and although it's not like the usual monopoly, I love the concept of building in different city's
Absolutely love this classic brought to life. Wonderful colors and gameplay. Great multi-player social media masterpiece.
This game is so fun if you really like Monopoly. I play it slot and have a cool team of players .
It's a good game so far no ads, no unnecessary payments. To an extent there is enough of everything. I just hope it doesn't mess up.
It's okay, but the app practically begs you to spend money. Many frequent pop ups.
Fun game no ads besides pay to continue or wait for more rolls. Not sure what function the landmarks play but great start, just came out yesterday?
Great game i love to play. But when ever you run out of rolls i gets annoying to have to hit the x like 8 times.

column11: Hi there. We would like to confirm that the rewards that you are getting from Chance Cards are all multiplied already. A great example would be the Dice Rolls since the base reward is 3 Dice Rolls only. So if you're using a x10 multiplier, you'll get a total of 30 Dice Rolls. Hope this helps.

Probably one of the worst mobile games I've played. The gameplay loop is shallow to the point where it's almost non existent, you hit a button it rolls you move and get the arbitrary rewards on that tile, there's no property buying or advancement, no other players on your board playing with you. This is monopoly in name only, no resemblance to the original game other than the characters. Oh and when you run out of rolls be ready for 3 pop ups prompting you to buy more with real money.

There's no gameplay - why is it even called monopoly. The gameplay consists of clicking a 'roll' button and passively gaining money to spend on increasingly costly building upgrades....and when you're done....you repeat that in a new setting. There is no monopoly gameplay, no sensical multiplayer, nothing. Huge disappointment for what could have been.
